Raw Details:
Founded in 2018, Bobobox is on a mission to redefine sleeping facilities to improve everyone’s lifestyle in the fast-changing world. What motivates our team the most is the ability to provide the most affordable and personalized pod at the most convenient distance for everyone to get a high-quality rest and sleep with a continuously improved experience. We believe in a culture of high trust, helping others, and healthy communication. 


Responsibilities

  1. Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines.
  2. Helping develop reports and analysis.
  3. Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata.
  4. Supporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements.
  5. Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization.
  6. Evaluating changes and updates to source production systems.
  7. Training end-users on new reports and dashboards.
  8. Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing.

Requirements:

  1. Minimum 2 year work experience as a data analyst or in a related field.
  2. Ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks.
  3. Ability to analyze existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations.
  4. Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms.
  5. High-level experience in methodologies and processes for managing large-scale databases.
  6. Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.
  7. Understanding of addressing and metadata standards.
  8. High-level written and verbal communication skills.

Title: Data Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Enable effective decision making by retrieving, aggregating and cleaning current Diary Bunda user data from multiple sources.', 'Design and maintain data systems and databases. Understand how different user data is collected and correlate to each other.', 'Create custom dashboards and reports that helps Diary Bunda track its KPI’s and empower the business to make strategic and operational decisions.', 'Self-manage delivery of data analysis and insights finding initiatives']
Requirements: ['Enable effective decision making by retrieving, aggregating and cleaning current Diary Bunda user data from multiple sources.', 'Design and maintain data systems and databases. Understand how different user data is collected and correlate to each other.', 'Create custom dashboards and reports that helps Diary Bunda track its KPI’s and empower the business to make strategic and operational decisions.', 'Self-manage delivery of data analysis and insights finding initiatives']
Raw Details:
Position Summary

Diary Bunda is in search of a talented and self-driven individual to help drive forward and maintain our ability to collect and analyse data from our platforms, ensuring we keep a competitive edge.

The Data Analyst will enable effective decision making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources and compiling it into actionable format. This role will also be responsible for the development and maintenance of automated reports and dashboards to support project priorities.

The ideal candidate must possess excellent organizational and time-management skills, as well as the ability to multi-task and prioritize responsibilities in a fast-paced environment. They should also be comfortable distilling large volumes of data and navigating complex scenarios.

Responsibilities

  • Enable effective decision making by retrieving, aggregating and cleaning current Diary Bunda user data from multiple sources.
  • Design and maintain data systems and databases. Understand how different user data is collected and correlate to each other.
  • Create custom dashboards and reports that helps Diary Bunda track its KPI’s and empower the business to make strategic and operational decisions.
  • Self-manage delivery of data analysis and insights finding initiatives

         - Define the business problem.

         - Determine the best analytical approach.

         - Efficiently extract relevant data.

         - Appropriately use statistical and data analysis techniques.

         - Share findings using impactful data visualization and efficient communication.

         - Balance multiple priorities, update stakeholders on progress and expected delivery.

  • Collaborate with business, product and engineering to define the data requirements of a product/new feature launch.
  • Analyse existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations.

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, related field or equivalent experience.
  • Minimum 3 years of working experience as a data analyst.
  • Expert in SQL and strong experience with a Data Visualization and Reporting tools (e.g. Tableau, Power BI, etc.)
  • Expert in Microsoft Excel (Macros, Vlookup, Pivot).
  • Practical knowledge of programming languages (e.g. Python, Shell) and Python/R for statistical analysis and data modelling.
  • Practical knowledge of Google analytics.
  • Fluent in written and verbal English.

Responsibilities: ['Analyze large, complex datasets to extract insights and decide on the appropriate technique', 'Generate insights for product and business teams through analyzing product performance and user behavior across our range of mobile and web products', 'Partner with data engineers, product team and business team to ensure that data collection and tracking has been correctly implemented, and that data is being stored correctly', 'Manage the infrastructure and data pipelines needed to serve and enable data in Sampingan', 'Provide visualizations to track business performanceWhat you need to have:', 'A Bachelors/Masters degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, Business or other analytical fields', 'At least 2 years of experience as an analyst, or in the Business Intelligence or Data Science fields', 'Excellent analytical, communication, and presentation skills to share recommendations clearly and effectively', 'Fluent in all variants of SQL', 'Experience in BigQuery, Metabase, Data Studio and Tableau is preferred', 'Strong contribution in database design and data architecture, data mining and analytics, data security and privacy, and data visualization', 'Proven analytical & problem-solving skills, good attention to detail, high level of curiosity, and structured-thinking process']

Raw Details:
Sampingan is an end to end workforce solution that helps our clients to scale their business through sourcing and managing the workers for them utilizing users that registered in our mobile application. Please find more details about our company here

      What you'll do: 

  • Analyze large, complex datasets to extract insights and decide on the appropriate technique
  • Generate insights for product and business teams through analyzing product performance and user behavior across our range of mobile and web products
  • Partner with data engineers, product team and business team to ensure that data collection and tracking has been correctly implemented, and that data is being stored correctly
  • Manage the infrastructure and data pipelines needed to serve and enable data in Sampingan
  • Provide visualizations to track business performance


    What you need to have:

  • A Bachelors/Masters degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, Business or other analytical fields
  • At least 2 years of experience as an analyst, or in the Business Intelligence or Data Science fields
  • Excellent analytical, communication, and presentation skills to share recommendations clearly and effectively
  • Fluent in all variants of SQL
  • Experience in BigQuery, Metabase, Data Studio and Tableau is preferred
  • Strong contribution in database design and data architecture, data mining and analytics, data security and privacy, and data visualization
  • Proven analytical & problem-solving skills, good attention to detail, high level of curiosity, and structured-thinking process

Title: Data Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Troubleshooting inkonsistensi data ketika terjadi problem dan anomali', 'Mengembangkan management Data Warehouse (DWH), Data Lake (DL) dan Data Mart', 'Membuat perancangan struktur data yang baik menyesuaikan dengan proses, requirement dan analisa bisnis', 'Mengembangkan solusi skala besar dalam infrastruktur data bersama dengan tim Devops', 'Melakukan Import dan export request data yang dibutuhkan oleh pengguna internal antar divisi', 'Membuat visualisasi data analitik dan statistik yang digunakan untuk memperkuat analisa dan keputusan bisnis', 'Membuat reporting dan email terjadwal yang diperlukan untuk mendukung operasional bisnis', 'Membuat disaster plan, perencanaan kapasitas dan simulasi penanganan permasalahan database']

Raw Details:
Responsibilities 

  • Troubleshooting inkonsistensi data ketika terjadi problem dan anomali
  • Mengembangkan management Data Warehouse (DWH), Data Lake (DL) dan Data Mart
  • Membuat perancangan struktur data yang baik menyesuaikan dengan proses, requirement dan analisa bisnis
  • Mengembangkan solusi skala besar dalam infrastruktur data bersama dengan tim Devops
  • Melakukan Import dan export request data yang dibutuhkan oleh pengguna internal antar divisi
  • Membuat visualisasi data analitik dan statistik yang digunakan untuk memperkuat analisa dan keputusan bisnis
  • Membuat reporting dan email terjadwal yang diperlukan untuk mendukung operasional bisnis
  • Membuat disaster plan, perencanaan kapasitas dan simulasi penanganan permasalahan database

Requirements 

  • Menguasai Amazon Redshift, Amazon EMR dan Google Big Query
  • Menguasai RDBMS database yakni MySQL, PostgreSQL dan Microsoft SQL Server
  • Menguasai No SQL database dan storage yakni MongoDB dan Redis
  • Menguasai Dashboard Metabase, Power BI dan Tableau
  • Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik dalam bidang matematika dan statistik
  • Memiliki pengalaman dalam bidang yang sama minimal 3 tahun
  • Minimal lulusan Sarjana S1 atau lebih tinggi

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Responsibilities: ['You will work on challenging internal Data Analytics projects, get opportunities to develop data marts and business dashboards to turn data into insights.', 'You will contribute to disseminate information regarding metrics definition, dashboards/reports, or insights.', 'You will receive hands-on mentoring from our data analytics leads.', 'You will receive sharing sessions about career in data analytics, data visualization best practices with Tableau, and analytical frameworks from our data analytics leads.']
Requirements: ['You will work on challenging internal Data Analytics projects, get opportunities to develop data marts and business dashboards to turn data into insights.', 'You will contribute to disseminate information regarding metrics definition, dashboards/reports, or insights.', 'You will receive hands-on mentoring from our data analytics leads.', 'You will receive sharing sessions about career in data analytics, data visualization best practices with Tableau, and analytical frameworks from our data analytics leads.']
Raw Details:
Overview of the responsibilities 

Take an internship and become a part where you will get a peek of what it takes and how it feels to work in the Analytics field especially as a data analyst in Pegipegi!

Job Responsibilities 

  1. You will work on challenging internal Data Analytics projects, get opportunities to develop data marts and business dashboards to turn data into insights.
  2. You will contribute to disseminate information regarding metrics definition, dashboards/reports, or insights.
  3. You will receive hands-on mentoring from our data analytics leads.
  4. You will receive sharing sessions about career in data analytics, data visualization best practices with Tableau, and analytical frameworks from our data analytics leads.

Requirements 

  1. Preferably final year university student or fresh graduate from these backgrounds: Mathematics/Statistics, Computer Science, Informatics Engineering, or Information System. Professionals with less than 2 years experience are welcome to apply.
  2. Have good experience in SQL.
  3. Familiar with Tableau and dashboard development.
  4. Have basic knowledge about Python for data analysis.
  5. Possess structured critical thinking and attention to details.
  6. Curious, able to learn independently, and a good team player.
  7. Passionate about data.

Required Skills

SQL, Tableau, Python

Preferred Courses

  • Mathematics/Statistics
  • Computer Science
  • Informatics Engineering
  • Information System

Internship Period

4 months

The world is full of people who have dreams – dreams of a successful career, dreams about moving abroad, dreams about traveling to far off places. At Wall Street English, we help people realize their dreams. We teach English. By learning English, a door of opportunity opens up for people. By learning English people open the door to a new future.

We have been learning partners to over 3 million people, and have been passionate about teaching English for over 46 years. Our method is proven and aligned to the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages, the global standard for language acquisition and education. We have a current enrollment of 190,000 students.

We have over 400 learning centers in 28 different countries across the globe. Our centers offer a near immersion experience and a unique Blended Learning Method to help each student reach their fullest potential.

· Detail oriented, analytical and inquisitive

Title: Business Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Build feasibility study for new potential locations.', 'Creating detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business', 'Defining business requirements in liaison with Business Development Associate', 'Create financial projection and also develop new financial arrangement / schemes with various stakeholders of the business, especially project investors.', 'Maintain master data and database for site acquisition process', 'Prepare and maintain SOP in Business Development department']
Requirements: ['Minimum Bachelor’s degree in related field', 'At least 3-years of professional experience in Business development', 'Having experience as Business development / analyst in property developer or property industry will be a plus', 'Having experience to build market analysis and business profitability', 'Excellent communication skills', 'You are a high energy individual', 'You have a high business acumen skill', 'You are an enthusiastic, motivated, positive attitude, and have the ability to learn quickly', 'Data-centric person', 'You are interested in assessing business opportunities and risks', 'Willing to be based in Bandung']
Skills Required: ['Business Analysis', 'Business Plan', 'Business Intelligence', 'Business Strategy', 'Data Analysis', 'Risk Analysis', 'Requirements Analysis', 'Competitive Analysis', 'Financial Analysis', 'Databases', 'Data Visualization']
Raw Details:
The Business Development team at Bobobox will grow significantly in the year of 2021 by implementing and supporting business information systems across multiple departments. A Business Analyst has to identify problems and opportunities within a company and ultimately provide solutions that help achieve the business’s goals, especially in the area of pipeline growth.

The Business Analyst at Bobobox will report to the Business Strategy Manager. Business analyst will be expected to build market analysis, analyzing both the product compatibility, profitability, and feasibility of the businesses. This role includes doing things like maintaining a database for site acquisition process, build location classification and grading, and also build financial projections for Bobobox’s next locations. Business Analyst also need to have strong knowledge to develop and maintain SOP in the internal department. Maintaining good relationships and coordinations with cross functional departments such as Finance, Legal, Architect and Site Project Team is crucial.

Responsibilities: 

  • Build feasibility study for new potential locations.
  • Creating detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business
  • Defining business requirements in liaison with Business Development Associate
  • Create financial projection and also develop new financial arrangement / schemes with various stakeholders of the business, especially project investors.
  • Maintain master data and database for site acquisition process
  • Prepare and maintain SOP in Business Development department

Requirements : 

  • Minimum Bachelor’s degree in related field
  • At least 3-years of professional experience in Business development
  • Having experience as Business development / analyst in property developer or property industry will be a plus
  • Having experience to build market analysis and business profitability
  • Excellent communication skills
  • You are a high energy individual
  • You have a high business acumen skill
  • You are an enthusiastic, motivated, positive attitude, and have the ability to learn quickly
  • Data-centric person
  • You are interested in assessing business opportunities and risks
  • Willing to be based in Bandung

Our mother company is South-East Asia’s leading online publisher, tickled media, reaching more than 29 million customers across SEA monthly. We bring the young and customers across SEA monthly. We bring the young and dynamic population of SEA the content they want and need. We speak to every stage of an Asian woman’s journey – from the time she graduates from university and starts building her career to when she’s starting her own family and looking into potential schools for her kids. To support young women and their babies even better, we created our own line of products. We are creating products specifically designed for the local market, leveraging on, and will do nothing less but to revolutionize the FMCG industry. We launched earlier this year in Indonesia and are already present in all leading online platforms and Central Department stores. We are building a team of young and ambitious leaders in Bangkok to drive the expansion of our business into the Thai market.

Why join us?

  • Strong core business growing at a double-digit rate, the leader in South East Asia
  • Opportunity to create something completely new with a great purpose
  • Dynamic, excited, and motivated team
  • Flexible working hours, many programs to support working mothers

Responsibilities:

  • Ensuring optimum visibility in all eCommerce by joining campaigns, listing on flash sales, activate supporting features, and all other promotions 
  • Building & managing relationship with an account manager in all eCommerce platform  to increase our online presence
  • Working closely with the fulfillment team to ensure stock allocation is properly managed across eCommerce platform to optimize sales
  • Assisting with decisions about promotions such as price discounts, vouchers, bundling prices, free shipping, and affordable bulk packages.
  • Creating & monitoring store pages across different eCommerce platform that includes store page, product description page, 3PL options, eCommerce features, and all other relevant eCommerce related requirements.
  • Creating & managing new and existing products that include product description page creation and management, new SKU content creation & all related e-commerce content
  • Ensuring that payment, 3PL, and other shopping options and promotional tabs are configured correctly.
  • Teaming up with our Graphic Designer Team, Content Marketing & Fulfillment to increase the online presence of our website.

  • Good command of Ms.Excel and other tools used for the optimization
  • Have experience and knowledge in eCommerce
  • Good analytical skills and experience generating sales reports

  • Have the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously

  • Knowledgeable about consumer preferences, particularly as these relate to e-commerce.
  • Fluent in English verbally and written

Title: HR Analyst
Responsibilities: ["Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Psychology, or related field required.", 'At least three years of experience in related areas such as job classification and compensation, recruitment, selection, training, employee benefits, and/or equal opportunity compliance preferred.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Thorough understanding of local, state, and federal laws involving employment, HR, and HR policies.', 'Proficient with Google Suite or related software.', 'Proficient with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS, payroll, and similar employee management software.']
Requirements: ["Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Psychology, or related field required.", 'At least three years of experience in related areas such as job classification and compensation, recruitment, selection, training, employee benefits, and/or equal opportunity compliance preferred.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Thorough understanding of local, state, and federal laws involving employment, HR, and HR policies.', 'Proficient with Google Suite or related software.', 'Proficient with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS, payroll, and similar employee management software.']
Raw Details:
Currently, we are looking for someone who can fill the position of HR Analyst

In general, you need to undertake a wide range of HR tasks, from recruitment, organizational development, to administration tasks. In this role, you will submit reports regarding employee records, labor laws, and employee surveys. Take a look at points below to understand more about this role.

  • Collects and compiles HR metrics and data from a variety of sources including the human resource information system (HRIS) and payroll outputs, management and employee surveys, exit interviews, employment records, government labor statistics, competitors practices, and other sources.
  • Analyzes data and statistics for trends and patterns with attention to recruitment, hiring practices, motivation, turnover, and compliance with employment laws and regulations.
  • Identifies and recommends reasonable short- and long-term goals, milestones, and benchmarks for key performance metrics.
  • Based on metrics and analysis, it makes recommendations for policies and activities to improve the organizational culture including suggestions to attract and hire qualified candidates, to motivate and retain employees, to address staffing issues, and to maintain legal compliance.
  • Ensures compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices.
  • Identifying why candidates and employees choose to work within a company and recommending areas in the workplace that can be improved.
  • Reviewing job descriptions to impact positively on employee retention.

The required skills

In order to carry out the obligations well, we need someone who has specific knowledge and abilities in a specific area. To make it easier, there are:

  • Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Industrial Psychology, or related field required.
  • At least three years of experience in related areas such as job classification and compensation, recruitment, selection, training, employee benefits, and/or equal opportunity compliance preferred.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Thorough understanding of local, state, and federal laws involving employment, HR, and HR policies.
  • Proficient with Google Suite or related software.
  • Proficient with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS, payroll, and similar employee management software.

Title: Digital Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Understand client measurement/design requirements and translate these business requirements into a written data collection implementation guide.', 'Work closely with developers teams to install, configure and use web analytics tools, tag management systems, and A/B testing tools. You will be responsible for tracking user interactions and clickstream data to understand customer behavior.', 'Identify and fix data collection issues and gaps on clients websites/apps.', 'Build customized dashboards & reports for relevant clients.', 'Offer deep-dive analysis to clients and UI/UX team, in order to determine UX optimization strategies.']
Requirements: ['Understand client measurement/design requirements and translate these business requirements into a written data collection implementation guide.', 'Work closely with developers teams to install, configure and use web analytics tools, tag management systems, and A/B testing tools. You will be responsible for tracking user interactions and clickstream data to understand customer behavior.', 'Identify and fix data collection issues and gaps on clients websites/apps.', 'Build customized dashboards & reports for relevant clients.', 'Offer deep-dive analysis to clients and UI/UX team, in order to determine UX optimization strategies.']
Raw Details:
We’re looking for a team member in our fast-growing company as Digital Analyst. You’ll be working on interesting projects from multiple clients in various industries. Collaborating with the clients directly and other team roles from UX & UI Designer, Frontend Developers, Backend Developers, Project Managers, as well as Data Analysts to provide the best solutions for clients.

Job Responsibility

  • Understand client measurement/design requirements and translate these business requirements into a written data collection implementation guide.
  • Work closely with developers teams to install, configure and use web analytics tools, tag management systems, and A/B testing tools. You will be responsible for tracking user interactions and clickstream data to understand customer behavior.
  • Identify and fix data collection issues and gaps on clients websites/apps.
  • Build customized dashboards & reports for relevant clients.
  • Offer deep-dive analysis to clients and UI/UX team, in order to determine UX optimization strategies.

Job Requirement

  • Good communication skills in English, both written and oral.
  • Knowledge of tracking tools & tag management systems (Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, or similar alternatives)
  • Knowledge of data visualization tools (Google Data Studio or Tableau or similar alternatives)
  • Proficiency in Spreadsheet (Excel/Google Spreadsheet) and familiarity with presentation tools (Powerpoint or Google Slides)

Helpful, but not required:

  • GAIQ Certification
  • Knowledge of/experience with A/B Testing platforms
  • Familiarity with development skills including HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery

Title: Business Analyst - ORAMI
Responsibilities: ['Creating a detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business', 'Budgeting and forecasting', 'Planning and monitoring', 'Reporting', 'Defining business requirements and reporting them back to stakeholders']
Requirements: ['Creating a detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business', 'Budgeting and forecasting', 'Planning and monitoring', 'Reporting', 'Defining business requirements and reporting them back to stakeholders']
Raw Details:
Job Description:

Business Analysts will conduct analysis of data to identify trends and extract insights that will drive decisions and strategy for future business performance. In addition, they develop and monitor data quality metrics and ensure business data and reporting needs are met. Strong technology, analytical and communication skills are must-have traits.

The role includes:

  • Creating a detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business
  • Budgeting and forecasting
  • Planning and monitoring
  • Reporting
  • Defining business requirements and reporting them back to stakeholders

Requirements:

  • Minimum of Bachelor Degree in Business Studies, Business Administration, Management or Marketing 
  • Min. 2 years experience in analytical roles or similar
  • Previous experience in e-Commerce, FMCG and/or Digital Marketing, Consulting Firm, with a background in Marketing Analytics or Consulting highly desired 
  • Good communication skills, both oral and written in English and Bahasa Indonesia
  • Interpersonal and consultative skills
  • Facilitation skills
  • Analytical thinking and problem solving
  • Being detail-oriented and capable of delivering a high level of accuracy
  • Organizational skills
  • Knowledge of business structure
  • Costs benefit analysis
  • Processes modeling
  • Understanding of networks, databases and other technology is a big plus

Title: Business Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Future equity share of projects', 'High performance-based compensation', 'Professional development and training opportunities']
Requirements: ['Future equity share of projects', 'High performance-based compensation', 'Professional development and training opportunities']
Skills Required: ['Business Development & Partnerships', 'Financial Modelling & Valuation', 'Market Research & Analysis', 'Business Analysis', 'Financial Analysis', 'Communication Skills', 'Project Management']
Raw Details:
We at NCU are looking for an analyst, who can be our future business partner. Are you a high-growth driven person with high standards? Are you hungry to grow and develop yourself as a person? We are looking for people to develop and grow our business. If you have the drive and seek growth, your background and past experience are irrelevant to us.

ABOUT US

NCU invests in and operates companies within basic necessity products. We are working to expand into food trade, processing and supply chain. 

We focus on growing our business in basic necessities. With our partners, we work on projects within property, logistics, supply chain, food processing and trading. Our mission is to grow people and communities in Indonesia by bringing work and education through investments and businesses.

THE PERSON WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We look for a smart young driven person, who wants to grow and learn. You will need to take responsibility and get out of your comfort zone. Critical, analytical thinking skills with the ability to quickly learn and execute are key to succeeding at NCU. 

WE OFFER YOU

An exciting role as key member in a team of professionals who seeks to grow you and our businesses together. You will get experience in a wide variety of assignments and fast personal growth within investment and trade. You will work in different areas of NCUs business and subsidiaries. 

WORKING AT NCU

You will be working with a small internal team of 2-3 people to push forward our projects, research and execute on new projects and trades. 

Your work will range from data analytics to reaching out to people. You will be tasked with analysis companies, ideas, and markets. You will have to find in the field if opportunities are relevant to pursue and you will gain an understanding of how the world works

BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH NCU

  1. Future equity share of projects
  2. High performance-based compensation
  3. Professional development and training opportunities

REQUIREMENTS AND EXPECTATIONS

  1. Fresh Graduates are welcome to apply, or 1-2 years of experience;
  2. A drive and energy to continuously grow, learn and execute; 
  3. Strong in critical thinking, information processing, and analytics;
  4. Able to execute on plans to move projects forward;
  5. Strong communication skills both oral and written in Indonesian and English; and 
  6. Bachelor’s degree in engineering, science, finance, economics, or any studies, are relevant.

If you are interested in taking the next step in your life, send us your CV and short cover letter describing why you are interested in working at NCU.

Title: Marketing Research Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Establish Insights Production Engine: Develop and manage proprietary insights strategies for Glints critical for driving top-of-mind awareness and demand generation amongst target audiences. Create and maintain a systematic, process-driven approach to deliver actionable insights that can be used to create content for employers/customers.', 'Deliver Timely, High-quality & Outcomes-Driven Insights: Stay up-to-date with the current and developing market trends. Find, collect and efficiently extract critical data and insights. Build appealing and easily digestible stories around insights to effectively engage audiences and support the achievement of marketing objectives.', 'Enable Planning & Performance Improvements Efficiencies: Build, manage & optimize performance reports/dashboards to provide clarity of marketing performances. Develop and provide insights and recommendations on what’s working and what’s not, and what else through ROI analysis, market and competitive research to support day-to-day decision-making and quarterly/annual planning.', 'Co-Develop & Implement Lead Scoring System: Co-design, build, validate and iterate on a lead scoring algorithm in HubSpot with CRM marketing manager to enable improvements to user/community engagement and lead generation engine for business opportunities.']
Requirements: ['Establish Insights Production Engine: Develop and manage proprietary insights strategies for Glints critical for driving top-of-mind awareness and demand generation amongst target audiences. Create and maintain a systematic, process-driven approach to deliver actionable insights that can be used to create content for employers/customers.', 'Deliver Timely, High-quality & Outcomes-Driven Insights: Stay up-to-date with the current and developing market trends. Find, collect and efficiently extract critical data and insights. Build appealing and easily digestible stories around insights to effectively engage audiences and support the achievement of marketing objectives.', 'Enable Planning & Performance Improvements Efficiencies: Build, manage & optimize performance reports/dashboards to provide clarity of marketing performances. Develop and provide insights and recommendations on what’s working and what’s not, and what else through ROI analysis, market and competitive research to support day-to-day decision-making and quarterly/annual planning.', 'Co-Develop & Implement Lead Scoring System: Co-design, build, validate and iterate on a lead scoring algorithm in HubSpot with CRM marketing manager to enable improvements to user/community engagement and lead generation engine for business opportunities.']
Skills Required: ['Research & Development (R&D)', 'Research', 'Design Research', 'Market Research', 'Market Research & Analysis', 'Analytical Skills', 'Analytics', 'Data Analysis', 'Business Analysis', 'Statistical Analysis', 'Microsoft Excel', 'English Language']
Raw Details:
About This Role

We are building the #1 tech-enabled recruitment and career discovery platform in Southeast Asia that helps people and organisations realize their human potential by joining great organisations, learning the right skills and building great teams. 


We’re looking for a Market Research Analyst to join our Product Marketing team, drive brand awareness and credibility for Glints amongst employers globally, by delivering unique and actionable insights to the market, thus enabling market penetration and positioning Glints as a thought leader in the HR space and the preferred solutions partner for employers.


What You’ll Be Doing

Using your deep expertise in quantitative and qualitative research, data analytics, modeling and insights formulation, you will be leveraging a combination of proprietary resources, market research, historical data, and partner insights to produce high-impact insights. 

You will be working closely with the B2B Content Marketing team to develop highly visible content pieces in a variety of content formats, such as blog articles, reports, infographics and business proposals that match the customers’ needs and align with business objectives. 

You will also support data-driven operations and strategy formulations for the Product Marketing team and Commercial business unit as needed.


In this role, you will:

  • Establish Insights Production Engine: Develop and manage proprietary insights strategies for Glints critical for driving top-of-mind awareness and demand generation amongst target audiences. Create and maintain a systematic, process-driven approach to deliver actionable insights that can be used to create content for employers/customers.
  • Deliver Timely, High-quality & Outcomes-Driven Insights: Stay up-to-date with the current and developing market trends. Find, collect and efficiently extract critical data and insights. Build appealing and easily digestible stories around insights to effectively engage audiences and support the achievement of marketing objectives.
  • Enable Planning & Performance Improvements Efficiencies: Build, manage & optimize performance reports/dashboards to provide clarity of marketing performances. Develop and provide insights and recommendations on what’s working and what’s not, and what else through ROI analysis, market and competitive research to support day-to-day decision-making and quarterly/annual planning.
  • Co-Develop & Implement Lead Scoring System: Co-design, build, validate and iterate on a lead scoring algorithm in HubSpot with CRM marketing manager to enable improvements to user/community engagement and lead generation engine for business opportunities.


Why You Should Join Us 

  • Play a key strategic role and contribute: You will be the first market research analyst hired in the product marketing team, and your work will directly contribute to short-term business outcomes and also fuels sustained business and brand growth of Glints, globally, in the long run.
  • Grow and develop: We are a fast-growing company that grew six times in revenue in the past year while doubling headcount. You will be part of this growth trajectory and given lots of challenges to grow quickly
  • Create an impact: Our company's purpose is to contribute to a world where all people and organizations can realize their human potential (check our culture deck here: http://bit.ly/glintsculture). As Product Marketing Manager, you will be directly building the company that fulfills this purpose.

 

Who We Are Looking For 

  • 3+ years of experience as Market Research Analyst or similar role
  • Bachelor degree in Marketing or Statistics or similar relevant field
  • Experience in data research and analytics for marketing or business, with passion in building data-driven culture, and enabling growth through insights
  • Uniquely analytical, strategic, and operational
  • Proven ability to flex, persist and be resourceful in challenging times, and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment
  • Highly motivated and result-oriented, with a positive outlook and a can-do attitude
  • Enjoys problem solving and challenging the status quo
  • Is authentic, humble and honest, with a flair in communications and stakeholder management to gain buy-ins, support and collaboration from decision-makers and stakeholders
  • Enjoys grinding and thinking out-of-the-box in a start-up environment
  • Experience in working with cross-geographical teams in Southeast Asia
  • High-level proficiency in spoken and written English


Let’s Realise Human Potential.

We are building the #1 tech-enabled recruitment platform in Greater Southeast Asia that helps people build their dreams by joining great organisations, learning the right skills and building great teams. 

We have impacted many lives but there’s still plenty to be done. If you’re ready to grow and make an impact, you’ve come to the right place.


What is Glints?

Glints is an online talent recruitment and career discovery platform with an enduring purpose of contributing to a world where people and organisations can realize their human potential. 

Our tech-enabled approach to recruitment and career discovery connects more than 1.5 million candidates to their next dream opportunities, has supported more than 30,000 companies in finding top talents, doubled recruiter efficiency, and has raised more than US$30M+ from best venture investors in Asia to-date. 

Our agility and firm hold on our core purpose and values has allowed us to remain resilient and thrive through tumultuous times.


We are proud to be recognized by LinkedIn as one of the Top 10 Startups in Singapore in 2020.


Who We Are

At Glints, personal and professional growth are just as important as business growth. That's why we created the Glints Culture Code: #RIIBCOH. It defines our values, is what guides our decisions and actions, and is what makes us special.

#RIIBCOH:

  • Relentlessly Resourceful: Whatever it takes, just make it happen (ethically)
  • Integrity: Have courage, be guided by the truth, don’t be afraid 
  • Impact: Missionaries, not mercenaries
  • Beginners’ Mindset: Stay humble, don’t be attached to ego
  • Customer Obsessed: Customers First
  • Ownership: Care intensely about the mission and take responsibility
  • High Standards: Dream big and deliver epic outcomes fast


Where we work

Since Glints was founded in Singapore in 2013, we've rapidly grown our footprint across Greater Southeast Asia to operate in Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam, Hong Kong and Taiwan.


Learn more about Glints and our culture at bit.ly/glintsculture.

Raw Details:
Business analysts help turn data into information, information into insight, and insight into business decisions.

Business Analysts at JULO are at the forefront of using data for building value by discovering insights about businesses, processes, market behaviors, and more. The successful candidate thrives in fast paced, data-driven environment, and excels in analyzing data from multiple sources, deriving insights, and recommending actions based on the insights.

  • Proficient in Excel
  • Experience in SQL would be a plus
  • 1 year experience in an analyst role at a technology/financial company
  • Bachelor's degree in any field which requires logically creative thinking
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills including ability to independently drive analysis concluding with rationalized recommendations
  • Strong communications skills for both technical and business purposes
  • Interest in fintech and high level of curiosity

Job Description:

● Engage broadly with stakeholder teams to structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact.

● Partner with business team leaders to frame, shape and execute on the critical insights for business decisions.

● Act as a consultant to the internal team to deliver a recommendation or insight to the internal team based on data (business team, collection, product etc)

● Develop a deep understanding of JULO’s loan products and processes

● Use past loan data to optimize our approval criteria, loan limit size, interest rate, and other relevant metrics

● Use past collections data to find opportunities to optimize our collections strategy

● Design, implement, and monitor marketing, operations and collections experiments

● Make data driven recommendations and monitor performance based on recommendations

● Work closely with stakeholders and help with creation of reports, dashboards, and monitoring tools

About the role:

As our next Funding Operations Analyst, you will support our channeling institution partner in terms of conducting transactions, reconciliation as well as portfolio monitoring. You will also work alongside other analysts as well as our fellow Funding Team who focused more on managing the relationship.

  • A Bachelor’s degree in any related field 
  • Experience in Banking Back Office or other Fintech, as well as having competencies in query would be huge plus

Our funding operations team consists of 6 people, we served more than 10 channeling institutions and helped them to ensure smooth transactions process as well as accuracy to maintain our partners portfolio quality. 

Funding operations team is part of bigger Business Operations team, with 2 (two) other departments which are Insurance and Reconciliation Team.

Responsibilities: ['Developing and maintaining daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly reports and Key Performance Indicators', 'Create monthly content for executive presentations and board reporting', 'Track and analyze key metrics including pipeline growth, win/loss rates, and quota attainment', 'Own the end-to-end process of tracking the sales funnel and operational metrics and delivering regular insights to the business; define and deliver techniques to improve the funnel performance for sales management.', 'Partnering with Sales Leaders to create and maintain sales forecasting models and data', 'Assisting the Sales Leaders with Pipeline and Opportunity inspection', 'Preparing Quarterly Business Review presentations', 'Supporting Financial Record for All Sales Achievement']
Requirements: ['3+ years of experience (1+ year in a sales role and 2+ years in Sales Operations)', 'Tech oriented', 'Proficiency with Microsoft Office', 'The ability to understand the strategic direction and goals of the Sales Department and support appropriate processes to facilitate achievement of business objectives', 'Well-developed capabilities in problem-solving and crafting efficient processes', 'A result and success oriented mentality, conveying a sense of urgency and driving issues to closure', 'An ability to initiate and build relationships with people in an open, friendly, and accepting manner', 'An innate drive to innovate and optimize the use of available resources', 'Comfort with adapting and adjusting to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity, and rapid change']
Raw Details:
A sales ops member who analyzes data, research, and/or processes. Duties may include handling sales data and reports, compensation and incentive plans, sales processes, and customer and marketing data. They help make data-driven decisions and recommendations for improving the sales funnel and process.

Responsibilities:

  • Developing and maintaining daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly reports and Key Performance Indicators
  • Create monthly content for executive presentations and board reporting
  • Track and analyze key metrics including pipeline growth, win/loss rates, and quota attainment
  • Own the end-to-end process of tracking the sales funnel and operational metrics and delivering regular insights to the business; define and deliver techniques to improve the funnel performance for sales management.
  • Partnering with Sales Leaders to create and maintain sales forecasting models and data
  • Assisting the Sales Leaders with Pipeline and Opportunity inspection
  • Preparing Quarterly Business Review presentations
  • Supporting Financial Record for All Sales Achievement

You should have the following:

  • 3+ years of experience (1+ year in a sales role and 2+ years in Sales Operations)
  • Tech oriented
  • Proficiency with Microsoft Office
  • The ability to understand the strategic direction and goals of the Sales Department and support appropriate processes to facilitate achievement of business objectives
  • Well-developed capabilities in problem-solving and crafting efficient processes
  • A result and success oriented mentality, conveying a sense of urgency and driving issues to closure
  • An ability to initiate and build relationships with people in an open, friendly, and accepting manner
  • An innate drive to innovate and optimize the use of available resources
  • Comfort with adapting and adjusting to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity, and rapid change

Performs analysis and generating insights and recommendations to support the business/product in decision making.', 'Improve processes by applying BI best practices.', 'Manage data products and disseminating information.', 'Consulting with internal customers (e.g. Operation, Commercial, Product, etc) to develop analyses that lead to actionable insights.', 'Collect data from multiple sources to create integrated views that can be used to drive decision making.', 'In charge for the day to day analytical requirements, communicating issues, suggesting remedial action and improvements where appropriate.', 'Oversee the execution of strategy recommendations for intelligence/data-driven capacity.', 'Accountable for data integrity and quality, ensuring it is continuously maintained and improved.', 'Develop and update technical documentation as necessary.\xa0']

The role will require the ability to extract data from various sources and to design/construct/execute complex analyses to come up with data/report that help solve the business problem.\xa0', 'Background in data warehouse design (e.g. dimensional modeling) and data mining.', 'Familiarity with BI technologies.', 'Familiar with one or more languages for querying (e.g. SQL, PostgreSQL).', '2+ years of experience with Big Data/Analytics Platform like R, Phyton is preferred.', '2+ years of ecperience with BI tools like Tableau, Looker or similar.', 'Proven abilities to take initiative and be innovative.', 'Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude.', 'BSc/BA in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field.\xa0']
Raw Details:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Sleekr, Talenta, Jurnal, KlikPajak) have been used by tens of thousands of business in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Responsibilities: 

  • Define and implement BI & analytic strategies to uncover actionable insights and opportunities from our existing data. Performs analysis and generating insights and recommendations to support the business/product in decision making.
  • Improve processes by applying BI best practices.
  • Manage data products and disseminating information.
  • Consulting with internal customers (e.g. Operation, Commercial, Product, etc) to develop analyses that lead to actionable insights.
  • Collect data from multiple sources to create integrated views that can be used to drive decision making.
  • In charge for the day to day analytical requirements, communicating issues, suggesting remedial action and improvements where appropriate.
  • Oversee the execution of strategy recommendations for intelligence/data-driven capacity.
  • Accountable for data integrity and quality, ensuring it is continuously maintained and improved.
  • Develop and update technical documentation as necessary. 

Job Requirements:  

  • Analytical mindset and ability to see the big picture and influence others. 
  • Detail-oriented and must have an aptitude for solving unstructured problems. The role will require the ability to extract data from various sources and to design/construct/execute complex analyses to come up with data/report that help solve the business problem. 
  • Background in data warehouse design (e.g. dimensional modeling) and data mining.
  • Familiarity with BI technologies.
  • Familiar with one or more languages for querying (e.g. SQL, PostgreSQL).
  • 2+ years of experience with Big Data/Analytics Platform like R, Phyton is preferred.
  • 2+ years of ecperience with BI tools like Tableau, Looker or similar.
  • Proven abilities to take initiative and be innovative.
  • Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude.
  • BSc/BA in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field. 

What You Will Get

  1. Competitive salary + daily allowance.
  2. Private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
  3. Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses.
  4. Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
  5. Flexible working hours and remote work culture.
  6. Notebook Ownership Program.
  7. Friendly and dynamic work environment.
  8. Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company.

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up. We wish you the best. Have a great day

  • Have banking, Insurance or tech company experience

  • Must have the ability to write complex SQL

  • Identifies financial status by comparing and analyzing actual results with plans and forecasts.

Title: Data Engineer
Responsibilities: ['Use agile software development processes to iteratively make improvements to our back end systems', 'Analyze and organize raw data.', 'Evaluate business needs and objectives', 'Conduct complex data analysis and report on results.', 'Work closely with our data science to help build complex algorithms that provide unique insights into our data.', 'Model front end and back end data sources to help draw a more comprehensive picture of user flows throughout our system and enable powerful data analysis.', 'Build data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources.', 'Develop models that can be used to make predictions and answer questions for the overall business.', 'Combine raw information from different sources.', 'Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability.', 'Identify opportunities for data acquisition.', 'Develop analytical tools and programs.']
Requirements: ['Use agile software development processes to iteratively make improvements to our back end systems', 'Analyze and organize raw data.', 'Evaluate business needs and objectives', 'Conduct complex data analysis and report on results.', 'Work closely with our data science to help build complex algorithms that provide unique insights into our data.', 'Model front end and back end data sources to help draw a more comprehensive picture of user flows throughout our system and enable powerful data analysis.', 'Build data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources.', 'Develop models that can be used to make predictions and answer questions for the overall business.', 'Combine raw information from different sources.', 'Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability.', 'Identify opportunities for data acquisition.', 'Develop analytical tools and programs.']
Raw Details:
Job Description

At Koltiva we rely on powerfully insightful data to inform our systems and solutions—and we’re seeking an experienced pipeline-centric data engineer to put it to use. You’ll wear many hats in this role, but much of your focus will be building out our ETL processes, writing superb SQL and managing Data Infrastructure. We’re looking for someone willing to jump right in to help the company get the most out of our data.

Responsibilities

  • Use agile software development processes to iteratively make improvements to our back end systems
  • Analyze and organize raw data.
  • Evaluate business needs and objectives
  • Conduct complex data analysis and report on results.
  • Work closely with our data science to help build complex algorithms that provide unique insights into our data.
  • Model front end and back end data sources to help draw a more comprehensive picture of user flows throughout our system and enable powerful data analysis.
  • Build data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources.
  • Develop models that can be used to make predictions and answer questions for the overall business.
  • Combine raw information from different sources.
  • Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability.
  • Identify opportunities for data acquisition.
  • Develop analytical tools and programs.

Qualifications

Minimum Requirements:

  1. Bachelor’s degree in Majoring Information Technology or equivalent.
  2. Minimum 3 years of experience as a Java Software Engineer, Data Engineer or similar role.
  3. Minimum 3 or more years of experience with Python, SQL, and data visualization/exploration tools.
  4. Familiarity with the AWS ecosystem.
  5. Experience building or maintaining ETL processes.
  6. Have an understanding or experience of Kafka or other Messaging technology is a plus.
  7. Communication skills, especially explaining technical concepts to non-technical business leaders.
  8. Ability to prioritize and multitask. Flexibility and adaptability in work approach.
  9. Ability to perform effective interaction with a broad range of people and roles.

Requirements: ['Minimum 4 years experience in Data Engineer', 'Advanced SQL knowledge and experience working with relational SQL (e.g. Postgres) and noSQL databases (e.g. MongoDB, Cassandra)', 'Experience in big data processing tools (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc)', 'Experience in building data pipelines (e.g. Luigi, Airflow)', 'Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform (e.g. GCS and BigQuery) is a plus.', 'Experience in performing root cause analysis to answer business questions and identify opportunities for improvements', 'Strong analytical skills related to working with unstructured datasets', 'Ability to manipulate, process, and extract from large disconnected datasets', 'Knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and scalable data stores', 'Working experience with Python and Pandas.Familiarity with the basic principles of distributed computing and data modeling.', 'Extensive experience with object-oriented design and coding and testing patterns, including experience with engineering software platforms and data infrastructures.', 'Working experience with Scala is a plus.', 'Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Be excited about collaborating daily with your team and other groups while working via a distributed model.', 'Be eager to help your teammates, share your knowledge with them, and learn from them.', 'Be open to receiving constructive feedback.']
Raw Details:
Founded in 2018, Bobobox is on a mission to redefine sleeping facilities to improve everyone’s lifestyle in the fast-changing world. What motivates our team the most is the ability to provide the most affordable and personalized pod at the most convenient distance for everyone to get a high-quality rest and sleep with a continuously improved experience. We believe in a culture of high trust, helping others, and healthy communication. 


Responsibilities

  • Build scalable, highly performant infrastructure for delivering clear business insights from a variety of raw data sources.
  • Develop batch & real-time analytical solutions, prototypes, and proofs of concept for selected solutions.
  • Build frameworks and tools to empower our data scientists and analysts.
  • Implement complex analytical projects with a focus on collecting, managing, analyzing, and visualizing data.
  • Be in constant communication with team members and other relevant parties and convey results efficiently and clearly.

Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years experience in Data Engineer
  • Advanced SQL knowledge and experience working with relational SQL (e.g. Postgres) and noSQL databases (e.g. MongoDB, Cassandra)
  • Experience in big data processing tools (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc)
  • Experience in building data pipelines (e.g. Luigi, Airflow)
  • Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform (e.g. GCS and BigQuery) is a plus.
  • Experience in performing root cause analysis to answer business questions and identify opportunities for improvements
  • Strong analytical skills related to working with unstructured datasets
  • Ability to manipulate, process, and extract from large disconnected datasets
  • Knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and scalable data stores
  • Working experience with Python and Pandas.Familiarity with the basic principles of distributed computing and data modeling.
  • Extensive experience with object-oriented design and coding and testing patterns, including experience with engineering software platforms and data infrastructures.
  • Working experience with Scala is a plus.
  • Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Be excited about collaborating daily with your team and other groups while working via a distributed model.
  • Be eager to help your teammates, share your knowledge with them, and learn from them.
  • Be open to receiving constructive feedback.

Responsibilities: ['Data Engineer - Brands (Nextbase)Hyphen GroupJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 1,000,000 – 1,300,000 17 Sep 2021', 'Commerce e-Business AnalystSIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 14 Oct 2021', 'Data AnalystYojeeSingapore, SingaporeSGD 3,800 – 6,400 with equity 14 Sep 2021', 'Lead Administrator AnalystKoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 9,000,000 – 14,000,000 3 Nov 2021', '(Banking) Data EngineerMatchaTalentJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 10,000,000 – 12,000,000 28 Sep 2021']
Requirements: ['Data Engineer - Brands (Nextbase)Hyphen GroupJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 1,000,000 – 1,300,000 17 Sep 2021', 'Commerce e-Business AnalystSIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 14 Oct 2021', 'Data AnalystYojeeSingapore, SingaporeSGD 3,800 – 6,400 with equity 14 Sep 2021', 'Lead Administrator AnalystKoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 9,000,000 – 14,000,000 3 Nov 2021', '(Banking) Data EngineerMatchaTalentJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 10,000,000 – 12,000,000 28 Sep 2021']
Raw Details:
Job Overview

The BI Engineer Officer is integrated in the Software Development Department and is working closely with MERL Team in the Operations Departments. The BI Engineer Officer goal is to ensure all support provided to customers in the form of report automation, visualization dashboard, building data warehouse, and technical support in excellent service standards across all our web and mobile applications.


Responsibilities and Duties

The BI Engineer Officer is responsible to support customer and our internal team by designing, developing, and maintaining business intelligence solutions, automated reports, and data warehouse to ensure continued satisfaction with Koltiva. Specific responsibilities in this role include:

• Development of high-quality database solutions.

• Develop, implement, and optimize stored procedures, triggers, and functions.

• Develop procedures and scripts for data migration.

• Analyze existing SQL queries for performance improvements or probably can suggest new queries.

• Design, build and deploy BI solutions (e.g., reporting tools) or data analytics report using existing tools and databases.

• Maintain and support data analytics platforms.

• Create tools to store data (e.g., OLAP cubes).

• Conduct unit testing and troubleshooting.

• Evaluate and improve existing BI systems and data reporting platforms.

• Commissioning and decommissioning of data sets.

• Develop and execute database queries and conduct analyses.

• Create visualizations and reports for requested projects.

• Helping develop reports and analysis to another team.

• Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata.

• Build appropriate and useful reporting deliverables.

• Review data for deficiencies or errors, correct any incompatibilities if possible and check output.

• Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines.

• Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analyst if necessary.

• Collaborate effectively with the development team by creating and issuing bug finding and proposing new feature upon request.

• Stay up to date with new products and features.

• Respond to queries for information and access relevant reports.

• Comply with data integrity and security policies.


Requirements

• Two years of experience as a Data Analyst, a BI Developer or similar role

• BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject.

• Knowledge of data analysis and reporting.

• Knowledge using statistical tools for data analysis (Excel, SPSS, SAS, Google Analytics).

• Strong knowledge and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc.), databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.), and programming as added value (PHP, JavaScript, or ETL framework).

• Background in data warehouse design (e.g., dimensional modelling) and data mining.

• In-depth understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) framework.

• Familiarity with BI technologies (e.g., Microsoft Power BI, Oracle BI).

• Experience with MS Office (MS Excel in particular) and data programs.

• Ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks.

• Ability to analyse existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations.

• Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms.

• High-level experience in methodologies and processes for managing large scale databases.

• Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.

• Understanding of addressing and metadata standards.

• Excellent time management skills and attention to detail is required.

• Analytical mind with a problem-solving attitude and critical thinking skills.

• Ability and desire to learn new skills and techniques.

• Ability to work multi-task and under strict deadlines.

• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

• High-level written and verbal communication skills, including communicating technical issues to non-technical audiences.

• Diligent and firm with high ethical standards.

Raw Details:
We are looking for a highly motivated, senior data scientist who loves technology with excellent problem-solving skills to take JULO’s machine learning capabilities to the next level.

Roles and Responsibilities:

• Plan, develop and deploy machine learning models and advanced analytics solutions to solve a

wide array of business problems

• Define problems and hypotheses, develop recommendations and decision support tools to

increase business value.

• Continuously improve the predictive value of our models, monitor model performance in

production systems closely.

• Influence product development, strategy and roadmap prioritization

• Tackle complex problems requiring a creative mindset to find innovative and elegant solutions

• Develop a culture of highly reproduceable work, attention to detail, quality of work and getting

solutions to production quickly

You should have:

• Exceptional CAN-DO ATTITUDE

• 3+ years of experience of applied Quantitative Analysis, Statistical Analysis or Modelling

• Experience working with relational SQL databases

• Fluency in Python and the Python Data Science toolkit

• Good understanding of CS fundamentals e.g. algorithms and data structures

• Excellent communication skills (Bahasa Indonesia and English)

• You must be results-oriented and willing to work in a fast and dynamic environment

• Deep understanding of Linear Algebra, (Multivariate) Calculus, Applied Mathematics and

Statistics, Algorithms and complex optimization

• Bachelor or Master’s degree in Statistics, (Applied) Mathematics, Engineering, Computer

Science, or similar advanced degree is preferred

Nice to have experience in any of the following:

• Experience with A/B testing and experimentation

• Domain knowledge in credit scoring, risk or loan portfolio management

• PhD Degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or Applied Mathematics

Requirements: ['Product Research (FMCG)Aplikasi SuperSurabaya, IndonesiaIDR 4,500,000 – 6,000,000 18 Oct 2021', 'Junior Business AnalystJULOJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 7,000,000 – 9,000,000 21 Oct 2021', 'Data AnalystYojeeSingapore, SingaporeSGD 3,800 – 6,400 with equity 14 Sep 2021', 'Associate Trade MarketerSIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 14 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data ScientistJULOJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 15,000,000 – 30,000,000 29 Oct 2021']
Raw Details:
Data Engineer

Responsibilities:

- Create, maintain and improve optimal data pipeline architecture

- Compiling large and complex datasets to fulfill business requirements

- Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.

- Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.

- A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.

- Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc

- Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and GCP ‘big data’ technologies.

- Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable business insights.

- Work with stakeholders including the Senior Management, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs

Requirements:

- Bachelor or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Computer Science)

- Minimum 1+ years of relevant work experience

- Experience in building and optimizing ‘Big Data’ data pipelines, architectures and datasets (including Batch and Streaming pipeline)

- Experience with big data tools: Spark, Kafka, Beam, Flink, Storm, etc.

- Experience with relational SQL or NoSQL databases, including Postgres or Cassandra.

- Experience with cloud services such as GCP or AWS and Linux environment and storage architecture.

- Experience with stream-processing systems: Flink, Spark-Streaming, Storm Bolt, etc.

- Experience with multiple programming languages (preferably at least one of Python, Go, Java)

- Have experience with R and Scala is a plus

- Willingness to learn new languages and technologies.

Title: Data Manager

Raw Details:
Job Description 

  • Lead a team of data scientists across multiple product squads or business functions.
  • Work with management and other stakeholders to prioritize business data needs and recommend new ways of using data to inform decision-making.
  • Conduct analysis and make recommendations that impact product and business directions.
  • Create data visualizations to uncover valuable insights and measure/track product performance.
  • Share knowledge and best practices with the entire data team.

Qualifications 

  • Bachelor's Degree in data science, mathematics, computer science, statistics, engineering or related major
  • At least 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or related roles
  • At least 1 year of experience in leading a data team
  • Proficient in statistics, experiment design/AB testing, data structuring, and analysis
  • Excellent analytical skills, critical thinking, creative problem solving, and english communication
  • Strong programming skills (Python and SQL)
  • Proficiency in git, CI/CD, and automation
  • Knowledge of databases and analytics data infrastructure
  • Experience in one of the following is a plus: Tableau, Looker, Google Data Studio Amplitude, Appsflyer, Clevertap, Google Analytics

Title: Head of Data
Responsibilities: ['Business Intelligence Analyst Aplikasi SuperSurabaya, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 8,000,000 6 Oct 2021', 'Data EngineerEmtradeJakarta, Indonesia 21 Oct 2021', '(Banking) Data EngineerMatchaTalentJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 10,000,000 – 12,000,000 28 Sep 2021', 'DATA ANALYSTActive8meSingapore, SingaporeSGD 1,000 – 4,000 18 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data AnalystRuangguru.comJakarta, Indonesia 27 Oct 2021']
Requirements: ['Business Intelligence Analyst Aplikasi SuperSurabaya, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 8,000,000 6 Oct 2021', 'Data EngineerEmtradeJakarta, Indonesia 21 Oct 2021', '(Banking) Data EngineerMatchaTalentJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 10,000,000 – 12,000,000 28 Sep 2021', 'DATA ANALYSTActive8meSingapore, SingaporeSGD 1,000 – 4,000 18 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data AnalystRuangguru.comJakarta, Indonesia 27 Oct 2021']
Skills Required: ['Data Warehouse', 'Amazon Web Services (AWS)', 'Python', 'Data Management', 'Big Data', 'Data Analysis', 'Redis']
Raw Details:
Job Description

We are looking for an exceptional Head of Data to join and lead our Data Team.


Core Roles & Responsibilities:

- Develop a comprehensive, organisation-wide data strategy and support the inclusion of relevant data components.

- Oversee all projects that are already underway and identify opportunities to maximize current investment and opportunities within our current data architecture. 

- Propose the adoption of suitable technologies and approaches and provide business cases for pursuing their implementation.

- Be the expert advisor to the stakeholders on all issues relating to the company's data.

- Review and manage the resource (Internal and external) and budget requirements in order to achieve the data strategy and vision.

- Develop and manage the data team.

- Review and lead on the company's procedures relating to data risk management, including working with the wider legal/governance teams on the impact of data legislation.


Qualifications:

- Bachelor’s degree of Computer Science from reputable University is preferable

- Proven English and Bahasa Indonesia proficiency both in written and spoken, and capable to deliver technical language into a simple language on a discussion across departments or on report arrangements 

- Have minimum 2+ years of proven experience in leading a data team as a HoD with deep technical expertise as engineer and scientist 

- Preferably have proven experience working in a crypto / financial industry will be an additional plus 

- Experience in working with various stakeholders in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment 

- Have excellent leadership skills with objective to manage and develop the data team 

- Strong analytical skills and proactive in problem solving

Title: Senior Data Scientist - Analytics
Responsibilities: ['Work with management to prioritize business data needs and recommend new ways of using data to inform decision-making.', 'Perform data visualizations to uncover valuable insights, be able to measure and track product performance.', 'Conduct analysis and make recommendations that impact product and business directions.']

Raw Details:
Job Description

As a data scientist, you will have the opportunity to leverage Ajaib’s rich data to develop insights and products that are used by millions of users and propel the growth of our business. 

You will collaborate with a strong team of engineers, product managers and fellow data scientists in defining the frontier of data products in fintech. Data scientists will work on how to evaluate current investor behaviors and develop potential product features

  • Work with management to prioritize business data needs and recommend new ways of using data to inform decision-making.
  • Perform data visualizations to uncover valuable insights, be able to measure and track product performance.
  • Conduct analysis and make recommendations that impact product and business directions.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's Degree in mathematics, computer science, statistics, engineering and related major.
  • At least 3 years of experience in Data Science roles
  • Proficient in Statistics, Data Structuring, Analysis
  • Excellent analytical skills & critical thinking, creative problem solving, and English communication
  • Strong programming skill (Python, R, or SQL).
  • Experience in one of the following is a plus: Tableau, Appsflyer, Clevertap, Google Analytics, Google Data Studio and Google Big Query

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Responsibilities: ['Lead Administrator AnalystKoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 9,000,000 – 14,000,000 3 Nov 2021', 'Machine Learning EngineerNRI IndonesiaJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 12,000,000 – 24,000,000 5 Nov 2021', 'Senior Data AnalystFlow Analytics Sdn BhdKuala Lumpur, MalaysiaMYR 4,000 – 10,000 4h ago', 'Data Engineer InternSIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 11 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data EngineerTADAJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 18,000,000 – 25,000,000 11 Oct 2021']

Raw Details:
Job Description: 

  • Designing and evaluating optimal data pipeline architecture.
  • Assembling large, complex data sets that meet functional/non-functional business requirements
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, maintaining data pipeline monitoring, etc.
  • Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS/GCP Big Data technologies.
  • Manage the auto-scaling and performance monitoring of the Data Infrastructure.
  • Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.
  • Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.
  • Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.
  • Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.


Job Requirements:

  • Candidate has a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or equivalent field
  • Has a minimum of 3 years working experience as Data Engineer
  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.
  • Strong knowledge of DBMS (e.g. Postgre, MySQL, etc), Big Data technologies (e.g. AWS Redshift/Athena, Google BigQuery, etc), programming (e.g. Python, Golang,  etc), and ETL frameworks (e.g. Airflow, Pentaho, Talend, etc)
  • Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.
  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and present information with attention to detail and accuracy for both structured and  unstructured datasets.
  • Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.
  • Having a successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.
  • Strong project management and organizational skills.
  • Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.
