Raw Details:
We are looking for an individual who keeps updated with the latest technology, techniques, and methods and has the ability to make an impact to improve the lives of our customers.

Responsibilities:

  • Work closely with business users to identify issues and use data to propose solutions for effective decision making,
  • Merge, manage, interrogate and extract data to supply tailored reports to stakeholders, lenders, borrowers, or the wider organization,
  • Maintain clear and coherent communication, both verbal and written, to understand data needs and report results,
  • Create clear reports that tell compelling stories about how lenders or borrowers work with the business,
  • Conduct research for develops prototypes and proof of concepts.

Requirements:

  • Know some programming languages such as R or Python,
  • Have strong database design and coding skills,
  • Proficient in using machine learning tools and statistical modeling concept i.e. Clustering, Linear or Non-Linear Models, Tree models, etc to produce solutions to problems,
  • Familiarity with cloud tools such as Amazon S3 can also be beneficial,
  • 4+ years of experience as a similar data scientist and a degree in quantitative fields.

If you think the above sounds fascinating, don't hesitate to apply and send us your latest CV. Our team will get back to you at soonest. Thank you!

Title: Research Manager
Responsibilities: ['Manage and lead the team in developing research ideas and strategies to better understand our users’ needs and behaviour to find business opportunities in concert with other functions', 'Manage our research pipeline and prioritise projects depending on the impact.', 'Designing both qualitative and quantitative research plans using the most appropriate research methodology to achieve research objectives', 'Frame effective research questions and hypotheses to have a deep understanding of our studies.', 'Design discussion guides and test scenarios that can minimize bias and leading effects of our research studies.', 'Collaborate closely with other functions \xa0in the research process to allow them to gain first-hand empathy of users.', 'Transform key findings and patterns into actionable insights via a rigorous synthesis process as well as communicate these insights in effective manners via storytelling and visual presentations.']
Requirements: ['Manage and lead the team in developing research ideas and strategies to better understand our users’ needs and behaviour to find business opportunities in concert with other functions', 'Manage our research pipeline and prioritise projects depending on the impact.', 'Designing both qualitative and quantitative research plans using the most appropriate research methodology to achieve research objectives', 'Frame effective research questions and hypotheses to have a deep understanding of our studies.', 'Design discussion guides and test scenarios that can minimize bias and leading effects of our research studies.', 'Collaborate closely with other functions \xa0in the research process to allow them to gain first-hand empathy of users.', 'Transform key findings and patterns into actionable insights via a rigorous synthesis process as well as communicate these insights in effective manners via storytelling and visual presentations.']
Raw Details:
About Us

We are a neo-banking venture aimed to improve the livelihood of SMEs in South-East Asian countries by providing solutions and building the path to inclusive access to financial service.

Our Products

The journey started with BukuKas, an app to digitize the physical record-keeping books by enabling micro and small enterprises to record their sales, expenses, and cash transactions at ease using their smartphone.

Recently we also launched BukukasPay, a digital wallet platform and online payment system that made it to #1 on the Playstore business category within 6 days of pure product-led growth.

Our second product, Tokko, enables micro and home industries to digitize their store and capture more customers.

Now we are proud to be chosen by over 6 million merchants in Indonesia to be their trusted partner in simplifying their cash management and growing their business through the online catalog.

Funding

We started our Seed Round through 500 startups and recently raised a funding of $50M in a Series B round, in May 2021. 

Backed by top venture capital firms including Sequoia Capital, Credit Saison, Speedinvest, January Capital, Founder Bank Capital, and other prominent investors and founders like Patrick Walujo, Sandeep Tandon, Nipun Mehra, Gokul Rajaram, and Amrish Rao, we are ready to pave inroads to additional financial services for SMEs in the future.

Ready to join the adventure in our rocketship? 

What will you do?

  • Manage and lead the team in developing research ideas and strategies to better understand our users’ needs and behaviour to find business opportunities in concert with other functions
  • Manage our research pipeline and prioritise projects depending on the impact.
  • Designing both qualitative and quantitative research plans using the most appropriate research methodology to achieve research objectives
  • Frame effective research questions and hypotheses to have a deep understanding of our studies.
  • Design discussion guides and test scenarios that can minimize bias and leading effects of our research studies.
  • Collaborate closely with other functions  in the research process to allow them to gain first-hand empathy of users.
  • Transform key findings and patterns into actionable insights via a rigorous synthesis process as well as communicate these insights in effective manners via storytelling and visual presentations.

What does it take?

  • 3 - 5 years of research experience where you have led research projects from start to finish.
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Psychology, Human-Computer Interaction, Design, Journalism or any related field with equivalent work experience.
  • Broad knowledge about the difference between strategic, directional and foundational research and the function of each of these research types.
  • Have the expertise and resourcefulness to adapt and experiment with different research methodologies to help get the insights we need.
  • Understand the importance of sampling design and operationalising participant criteria into screening surveys to find the right participants for the studies.
  • Proficient with research methods such as but not limited to Usability Tests (Moderated/Unmoderated, Card Sorting), A/B Tests, In-depth Interviews, Contextual Inquiry (Participatory Design), Concept Testing (Analogous Inspiration, Extreme User Research etc.), Surveys.
  • Experience in conducting quantitative research, including but not limited to designing efficient survey questions with screeners, data analysis to uncover the patterns and actionable insights from raw data.
  • Thrive in an environment with a short feedback loop, both giving and receiving constructive feedback to help move the team forward.
  • Able to plan and manage your time well and can anticipate the dependencies of your deliverables with other teammates.

  • Proficient with research methods such as but not limited to Usability Tests (Moderated/Unmoderated, Card Sorting), A/B Tests, In-depth Interviews, Contextual Inquiry (Participatory Design), Concept Testing (Analogous Inspiration, Extreme User Research etc.), Surveys.
  • Experience in conducting quantitative research, including but not limited to designing efficient survey questions with screeners, data analysis to uncover the patterns and actionable insights from raw data.
  • Thrive in an environment with a short feedback loop, both giving and receiving constructive feedback to help move the team forward.
  • Able to plan and manage your time well and can anticipate the dependencies of your deliverables with other teammates.

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Responsibilities: ['Anticipate, identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality', 'Design Data warehouse requirements based on Business Matrix with a proper naming convention prior to Development', 'Design end to end ETL as per-use cases and business requirements', 'Implement complex automated workflows and routines using workflow scheduling tools', 'Drive collaborative reviews of design, code, and datasets implementation performed by other data engineers in support of maintaining data engineering standards', 'Troubleshoot complex data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issues', 'Explore and learn new best practices/technologies that can improve our current stack']
Requirements: ['Anticipate, identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality', 'Design Data warehouse requirements based on Business Matrix with a proper naming convention prior to Development', 'Design end to end ETL as per-use cases and business requirements', 'Implement complex automated workflows and routines using workflow scheduling tools', 'Drive collaborative reviews of design, code, and datasets implementation performed by other data engineers in support of maintaining data engineering standards', 'Troubleshoot complex data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issues', 'Explore and learn new best practices/technologies that can improve our current stack']
Raw Details:
The Company

TADA (usetada.com) helps businesses to improve sustainability by retaining their customers better. It is an end-to-end customer retention platform that brings together customer data and behavior from online and offline channels to launch and manage a revenue-centric retention program. Established in 2012, present in several countries in Southeast Asia. Our vision is to be the most impactful customer retention platform in the region. TADA has successfully been trusted by and integrated with 400+ Global Companies across fast-growing industries.

The Role: Senior Data Engineer

  • Anticipate, identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality
  • Design Data warehouse requirements based on Business Matrix with a proper naming convention prior to Development
  • Design end to end ETL as per-use cases and business requirements
  • Implement complex automated workflows and routines using workflow scheduling tools
  • Drive collaborative reviews of design, code, and datasets implementation performed by other data engineers in support of maintaining data engineering standards
  • Troubleshoot complex data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issues
  • Explore and learn new best practices/technologies that can improve our current stack

The Candidate

  • 3+ years hands-on experience deploying production quality code
  • Experience using Python, Java, Go, or Scala for data processing (Python preferred)
  • Demonstrably understanding of SQL, Data Modeling and Data Warehousing (Redshift preferred)
  • Hands-on experience implementing ETL (or ELT) and data pipeline tools
  • Experience with workflow scheduling tools like Airflow
  • Understanding Linux and docker is a plus
  • Passionately in love with programming
  • Excellent team player
  • Have passion, interest, and willingness to learn and share

What we offer

  • A high degree of autonomy and freedom of creativity in a welcoming environment.
  • Sabbatical program of 15 days blocked leaves every 3 years of your tenure with us to recharge as we know that working long term in a company might be taxing.
  • We aim to create an entrepreneur out of our team, where we are committed to supporting learning and development aspirations within and outside of our organization.
  • A unique environment of a mission-driven digital company present since 2012, start-up mindset always - yet a bit wiser.

Our Values

  • Think and Act Like an Owner.
  • Deliver Beyond Expectation.
  • Be Helpful.
  • Embrace and Drive Change.
  • Pursue Learning and Growth.
  • Be Open, Honest, and Constructive.

If you are up for the challenge, we hope you will join the team and take part in our journey to be the Most Impactful CRP in the region.

['At least 3 years of experience working in data engineering, data architecture, data modelling, master data management, or similar.', 'In-depth understanding of data pipelines (ETL/ELT), database structure principles, data warehousing techniques, data mining concepts, and segmentation techniques.', 'Experience in designing and implementing data warehouse and data mart.', 'Experience in database performance tuning.', 'Hands-on experience in SQL and Python.', 'Passionate and knowledgeable about big data stacks.

', 'Distributed systems: Spark, Hadoop, Presto, Hive, etc.', 'Message Queueing systems: Kafka, etc.', 'Database (Relational & NoSQL): PostgreSQL, MySQL, Cassandra, etc.', 'Workflow Orchestrator: Airflow, etc.', 'Business Intelligence Tool: Looker, Tableau, etc.', 'Experience gathering and analyzing both system and business requirements.', 'Experience with cloud computing platforms (AWS, AliCloud, GCP, or others) and UNIX environment.', 'Have fast learning capability and natural curiosity about big data.']
Raw Details:
Job Description

  • Design, develop, and maintain highly scalable data infrastructure.
  • Design data warehouse/data mart and implement appropriate data models depending on different data use cases.
  • Design, develop, and maintain a single source of truth for key business metrics.
  • Ensure standardized metadata, access protocols, and discovery mechanisms.
  • Act as a subject matter expert for data architecture, data modelling, solution design, and best practices within the Data Team.
  • Develop a good understanding of the Business with its various domains and understand data use cases across different functions. 
  • Build data quality checks and ensure quality of data products, including timeliness, consistency, performance, and accuracy.
  • Collaborate with the Engineering department on data governance/security standards and ensure that data products meet those standards.
  • Monitor data collection, storage and retrieval processes.
  • Explore and integrate appropriate new big data technologies into current infrastructure.

Qualifications

  • At least 3 years of experience working in data engineering, data architecture, data modelling, master data management, or similar.
  • In-depth understanding of data pipelines (ETL/ELT), database structure principles, data warehousing techniques, data mining concepts, and segmentation techniques.
  • Experience in designing and implementing data warehouse and data mart.
  • Experience in database performance tuning.
  • Hands-on experience in SQL and Python.
  • Passionate and knowledgeable about big data stacks.
    • Distributed systems: Spark, Hadoop, Presto, Hive, etc.
    • Message Queueing systems: Kafka, etc.
    • Database (Relational & NoSQL): PostgreSQL, MySQL, Cassandra, etc.
    • Workflow Orchestrator: Airflow, etc.
    • Business Intelligence Tool: Looker, Tableau, etc.
  • Experience gathering and analyzing both system and business requirements.
  • Experience with cloud computing platforms (AWS, AliCloud, GCP, or others) and UNIX environment.
  • Have fast learning capability and natural curiosity about big data.

Raw Details:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Talenta, Sleekr, Jurnal, KlikPajak) have been used by tens of thousands of business in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Description 

  • Manage a team of highly motivated data engineers to achieve success and drive the company forward
  • Provide technical leadership to your team by giving guidance on designs and coding best practices
  • Proactively drive the vision for data engineering, as well as define and execute on a plan to achieve that vision
  • Proactively mentor and grow the team to their fullest potential
  • Responsible for data quality across business areas
  • Collaborate with Data Science team to deliver impactful initiatives
  • Implement new technologies and tooling to further enable science and analytics

Requirements/Qualifications

  • A desire to work in a collaborative, intellectually curious environment
  • Excellent critical thinking, problem solving and analytical skills
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  • 4+ Years of Data Platform Experience, preferably with Airflow and AWS related services
  • Experience in maintaining datalake and datawarehouse systems and working on large scale data transformation using EMR, Hadoop, Hive, or other Big Data technologies
  • Coding proficiency in Python
  • Experience with hardware provisioning, forecasting hardware usage, and managing to a budget
  • Experience mentoring and managing other Data Engineers, ensuring data engineering best practices are being followed
  • Proven track record of sharing outcomes through written communication, including an ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams
  • Experience with security standard compliances is a plus
  • Extensive experience working with AWS with a strong understanding of Redshift, EMR, Athena, Lambda, S3, EC2 is a plus

What You Will Get

  1. Competitive salary + daily allowance
  2. Private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental)
  3. Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses
  4. Strategic office location, accessible by MRT
  5. Flexible working hours and remote work culture
  6. Notebook Ownership Program
  7. Friendly and dynamic work environment
  8. Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up. We wish you the best. Have a great day

Title: Senior Data Engineer
Responsibilities: ['Gather requirements from stakeholders including but not limited to Executive, Finance, Product, Operations, Marketing and Analytics Team.', 'Design, build and operate an event-driven serverless data pipeline using AWS Serverless Application Model from various Data Sources to BigQuery Data Warehouse.', 'Migrate existing data pipeline to event-driven serverless data pipeline.', 'Coordinate tasks with other data engineers to manage, monitor and maintain all data pipelines.', 'Document every architecture, infrastructure, application and data pipeline to a scalable, maintainable and manageable documentation.', 'Determine pain points of every manual task and automate it using data technologies.']
Requirements: ['Gather requirements from stakeholders including but not limited to Executive, Finance, Product, Operations, Marketing and Analytics Team.', 'Design, build and operate an event-driven serverless data pipeline using AWS Serverless Application Model from various Data Sources to BigQuery Data Warehouse.', 'Migrate existing data pipeline to event-driven serverless data pipeline.', 'Coordinate tasks with other data engineers to manage, monitor and maintain all data pipelines.', 'Document every architecture, infrastructure, application and data pipeline to a scalable, maintainable and manageable documentation.', 'Determine pain points of every manual task and automate it using data technologies.']
Raw Details:
Job Description 

We are looking for an exceptional Senior Data Engineer to join our team building a cloud native application and data platform.

Core Roles & Responsibilities: 

  • Gather requirements from stakeholders including but not limited to Executive, Finance, Product, Operations, Marketing and Analytics Team.
  • Design, build and operate an event-driven serverless data pipeline using AWS Serverless Application Model from various Data Sources to BigQuery Data Warehouse.
  • Migrate existing data pipeline to event-driven serverless data pipeline.
  • Coordinate tasks with other data engineers to manage, monitor and maintain all data pipelines.
  • Document every architecture, infrastructure, application and data pipeline to a scalable, maintainable and manageable documentation.
  • Determine pain points of every manual task and automate it using data technologies.

Qualifications: 

You are the right person if you...

  • Bachelor’s degree of Computer Science from reputable University is preferable
  • Proven English and Bahasa Indonesia proficiency both in written and spoken, and capable to deliver technical language into a simple language on a discussion across departments or on report arrangements 
  • Have minimum 2+ years of proven experience working as a Data Engineer with deep technical expertise 
  • Preferably have proven experience working in a crypto / financial industry will be an additional plus 
  • Experience in working with various stakeholders in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment 
  • Have excellent leadership skills with objective to manage and develop the data team 
  • Strong analytical skills and proactive in problem solving

CGRowResearch uses data, statistics, and grit to predict and analyze sporting events. Everything that's built needs to be robust, easy to use for the clients, and be able to dynamically react to continually updating sports data. All whilst using the fewest lines of code possible.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Responsibilities: ['Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.', 'Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.', 'Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.', 'Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.', 'Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting and other business outcomes.', 'Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality.', 'Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.', 'Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.']
Requirements: ['Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development.', 'Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.', 'Experience working with and creating data architectures.', 'Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.', 'Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.', 'A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.']
Raw Details:
Job Description 

  • Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.
  • Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.
  • Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
  • Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
  • Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting and other business outcomes.
  • Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality.
  • Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
  • Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.

Qualifications 

  • Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development.
  • Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
  • Experience working with and creating data architectures.
  • Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
  • Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.
  • A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.

Raw Details:
Position

The Data Administration Support Officer is integrated in the Operation Department and is working closely with Implementation Team in the Operation Department. The Data Administration Support Officer goal is to ensure all support provided to customers in the form of reports, data checking and technical support in excellent service standards across all our web and mobile applications.


Responsibilities

The Data Administration Support Officer is responsible to support all units under Operation Department in terms of data administration and reporting. Specific responsibilities in this role include: 

  • Managing Master data, including creation, updates and deletion. 
  • Managing users and user roles. 
  • Maintain and update survey data records. 
  • Administer the process on IMS Certification, profiling all of the actors in the supply chain, and helping the user understanding the process. 
  • Provide weekly and/or monthly survey progress reports. 
  • Check data accuracy in master data and survey data. 
  • Commissioning and decommissioning of data sets. 
  • Helping develop reports and analysis. 
  • Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata. 
  • Supporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements. 
  • Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization. 
  • Comply with data integrity and security policies. 
  • Troubleshooting the reporting database environment and reports. 
  • Evaluating changes and updates to source production systems. 
  • Review data for deficiencies or errors, correct any incompatibilities if possible and check output. 
  • Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines. 
  • Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analyst if necessary. 
  • Collaborate effectively with the development team by creating and issuing bug finding and proposing new feature upon request. 
  • Stay up to date with new products and features. 
  • Assessing tests and implementing new or upgraded software and assisting with strategic decisions on new systems. 
  • Training end users on new reports and dashboards. 
  • Training end users on data collectors and farmers mobile app. 
  • Respond to queries for information and access relevant reports. 


Requirements 

  • At least two years experience at the supervisory level in a similar position. 
  • Minimum Diploma 3 from an accredited University or college in Computer Science. 
  • Knowledge of data analysis and reporting. 
  • Experience using statistical tools for data analysis (Excel, SPSS, SAS, Google Analytics). 
  • Strong knowledge and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc.), databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.), and programming as added value (PHP, JavaScript, or ETL framework). 
  • Experience with MS Office (MS Excel in particular) and data programs. 
  • Work experience as a data analyst or in related field. 
  • Ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks. 
  • Ability to analyse existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations. 
  • Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms. 
  • High-level experience in methodologies and processes for managing large scale databases. 
  • Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases. 
  • Understanding of addressing and metadata standards. 
  • Thorough with Strong Analytical Skills. 
  • Investigative and Trouble Shooting Skills. 
  • Impeccable attention to detail. 
  • Confidentiality. 
  • Ability to work under strict deadlines. 
  • High-level written and verbal communication skills. 
  • Full understanding of the way an organization operates to meet its objectives. 
  • Diligent and firm with high ethical standards.

Title: Head of Data
Responsibilities: ['Senior Data EngineerPT Pintu Kemana Saja (Pintu)Jakarta, Indonesia 4 Oct 2021', 'Business AnalystsZENIKA PTE LTDSingapore, SingaporeSGD 6,000 – 9,000 29 Sep 2021', 'Software Engineer FullStack (Bizzy Digital)Warung Pintar GroupJakarta, Indonesia 14 Sep 2021', 'HR Business AnalystDataOn CorpIndonesia Bulk Terminal, IndonesiaIDR 8,000,000 – 15,000,000 15 Sep 2021', 'Business Analyst - ORAMI SIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 15 Sep 2021']
Requirements: ['Senior Data EngineerPT Pintu Kemana Saja (Pintu)Jakarta, Indonesia 4 Oct 2021', 'Business AnalystsZENIKA PTE LTDSingapore, SingaporeSGD 6,000 – 9,000 29 Sep 2021', 'Software Engineer FullStack (Bizzy Digital)Warung Pintar GroupJakarta, Indonesia 14 Sep 2021', 'HR Business AnalystDataOn CorpIndonesia Bulk Terminal, IndonesiaIDR 8,000,000 – 15,000,000 15 Sep 2021', 'Business Analyst - ORAMI SIRCLOTangerang, Indonesia 15 Sep 2021']
Skills Required: ['Databases', 'Automation', 'Data Warehouse', 'Agile', 'Relational Databases', 'Data Science', 'Data Management', 'Leadership', 'Scrum', 'Data Analysis', 'English Language', 'Team Leadership']
Raw Details:
Job Overview

As the Head of Data you will be responsible for developing and governing our data and information strategy in order to drive business decisions and growth. You will develop data procedures and policies, and work closely with various departments to collect, prepare, organize, protect, and analyze data assets while ensuring that the company meets industry best practices.

You will also responsible for defining the roadmap for your team and be responsible for planning and executing key initiatives for data science, machine learning, and product insights.

Other duties will include leading inter-disciplinary teams, improving and streamlining data systems within the company, and driving innovation.


Responsibilities

· Drive innovation on data strategy, analytics practice and systems improvement.

· Designing, building, managing and optimizing data pipelines and then moving these data pipelines effectively into production for key data and analytics consumers (like business/data analysts, data scientists).

· Managing technical teams of data engineering, data analyst, data science and BI with relevant applications including big data solutions, machine learning capabilities and BI tools.

· Guarantee compliance with data governance and data security requirements while creating, improving and operationalizing these integrated and reusable data pipelines, to enable faster data access, integrated data reuse and improved time-to-solution for Koltiva’s data and analytics initiatives.

· Implement data privacy policies and comply with data protection regulations.

· Create and enforce policies for effective data management.

· Formulate techniques for quality data collection to ensure adequacy, accuracy and legitimacy of data.

· Support others in the daily use of data systems and ensure adherence to legal and company standards.

· Effectively communicate the status, value, and importance of data to executive members and staff.


Requirements

Technical Requirements:

1.Excellent technical skills to demonstrate in all areas of data practice including data engineering (pipeline and data warehouse management), data science and advanced analytics.

2. Strong understanding of data management fundamentals, including concepts such as data dictionaries, data models, validation, and reporting.

3. Ability to manage a team in using data tools to create validation rules (both simple and complex).

4. Ability to lead teams in building dynamic dashboards, reports, and presentations on data quality and data status.

5. Experience managing data through its lifecycle (especially sourcing, validating, and deploying).

6. Experience with different types of databases, including structured and unstructured.

7. Experience querying and manipulating data stored in databases to build reports or dashboards.

8. Experience managing automated systems.

9. Experience using Scrum/Agile development methodologies.


Minimum Requirements:

1. Bachelor’s degree in Majoring Information Technology or equivalent.

2. Minimum 5 years of management experience in leading data and analytics team.

3. Ability to prioritize and multitask. Flexibility and adaptability in work approach.

4. Ability to perform effective interaction with a broad range of people and roles.

5. Results orientated, proactive, takes initiative.

6. Strong organizational and project management skills.

7. Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia and English.

Title: Data Governance
Responsibilities: ['Machine Learning EngineerNRI IndonesiaJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 12,000,000 – 24,000,000 5 Nov 2021', 'Backend Developer, Machine Learning IoT CybersecurityMicrosecSingapore, Singapore 25 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data AnalystHappyFreshJakarta, Indonesia 2 Nov 2021', 'Senior Business Intelligence AnalystMekari (PT. Mid Solusi Nusantara)Jakarta, IndonesiaIDR 15,000,000 – 30,000,000 4 Oct 2021', 'UX Researcherdetik.comJakarta, Indonesia 7 Oct 2021']
Requirements: ['Machine Learning EngineerNRI IndonesiaJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 12,000,000 – 24,000,000 5 Nov 2021', 'Backend Developer, Machine Learning IoT CybersecurityMicrosecSingapore, Singapore 25 Oct 2021', 'Senior Data AnalystHappyFreshJakarta, Indonesia 2 Nov 2021', 'Senior Business Intelligence AnalystMekari (PT. Mid Solusi Nusantara)Jakarta, IndonesiaIDR 15,000,000 – 30,000,000 4 Oct 2021', 'UX Researcherdetik.comJakarta, Indonesia 7 Oct 2021']
Raw Details:
Roles and Responsibilities

  • Establish and govern an enterprise data governance implementation roadmap including strategic priorities for the development of information-based capabilities
  • Roll out an enterprise-wide data governance framework, with a focus on improvement of data quality and the protection of sensitive data through modifications to organization behavior policies and standards, principles, governance metrics, processes, related tools, and data architecture
  • Define roles and responsibilities related to data governance and ensure clear accountability for the stewardship of the company’s principal information assets
  • Serve as a liaison between Business and Functional areas and technology to ensure that data related business requirements for protecting sensitive data are clearly defined, communicated and well understood, and considered as part of operational prioritization and planning
  • Develop & maintain inventory of the enterprise information maps, including authoritative systems, owners
  • Facilitate the development and implementation of data quality standards, data protection standards, and adoption requirements across the enterprise
  • Define indicators of performance and quality metrics and ensure compliance with data related policies, standards, roles and responsibilities, and adoption requirements
  • Lead Senior Management, comprising resources from the Business and Functional areas and IT business and operations functions, to achieve their objectives; resolve issues escalated from Business and Functional areas data governance representatives
  • In conjunction with the IT, provide progress reports to Board management and oversee periodic updates to the Department Data Governance Roadmap
  • Coordinate external data sources to eliminate redundancy and streamline the expense related to those services
  • Identify new business opportunities pertaining to the use of information assets to achieve efficiency and effectiveness in the marketplace / represent data as a strategic business asset at the Senior Management table


Qualifications

  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in a major services organization, with large-scale data or project management and oversight experience. 
  • 2 years in a senior management role, with Board level change or transformation leadership experience.
  • Knowledge of industry-leading data quality and data protection management practices
  • Knowledge of data governance practices, business, and technology issues related to the management of enterprise information assets and approaches related to data protection
  • Knowledge of data related government regulatory requirements and emerging trends and issues
  • Demonstrated consulting skills, with change management concepts and strategies, including communication, culture change, and performance measurement system design
  • Knowledge of risk data architecture and technology solutions
  • Internally and externally recognized subject matter experts that influence the way things are done
  • Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, MIS, or Information Management

Raw Details:
Job Description

We are looking to hire data support officer to join our data team. You will take responsibility for managing our master data set, developing report, and troubleshooting data issues. To do well in this role you need a very fine eye for detail, experience as a data analyst, and deep understanding of popular data analysis tools and database.


Responsibilities

· Managing Master data, including creation, updates and deletion.

· Managing users and user roles

· Provide quality assurance of imported data, working with quality assurance analyst if necessary

· Commissioning and decommissioning of data sets

· Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines

· Helping develop reports and analysis

· Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata

· Supporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements

· Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization

· Assessing tests and implementing new or upgraded software and assisting with strategic decisions on new systems

· Generating reports from single or multiple systems

· Troubleshooting the reporting database environment and reports

· Evaluating changes and updates to source production systems

· Training end users on new reports and dashboards

· Providing technical expertise on data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing


Requirements

· Minimum Diploma 3 from an accredited University or college in Computer Science

· Experience using statistical tools for data analyses (Excel, SPSS, SAS, Google Analytics)

· Strong knowledge and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc.), databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.).

· Work experience as a data analyst or in related field

· Ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks

· Ability to analyse existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations

· Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms

· High-level experience in methodologies and processes for managing large scale databases

· Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases

· Understanding of addressing and metadata standards

Title: Risk Analytics
Responsibilities: ['Develop and maintain all regulatory requirements, comprising of risk modeling, stress testing, MIS & Intelligence and scorecard developments.\xa0', 'Oversee various risk analytics functions and be responsible for formulating and assessing credit policies, risk acceptance criteria, risk appetite, risk-based pricing and other risk models.', 'Provide comprehensive credit analysis and presentations to provide insight of all current and future consumer finance portfolios.\xa0', 'Develop the risk culture of the business as well as undertaking business growth strategies.']
Requirements: ['Develop and maintain all regulatory requirements, comprising of risk modeling, stress testing, MIS & Intelligence and scorecard developments.\xa0', 'Oversee various risk analytics functions and be responsible for formulating and assessing credit policies, risk acceptance criteria, risk appetite, risk-based pricing and other risk models.', 'Provide comprehensive credit analysis and presentations to provide insight of all current and future consumer finance portfolios.\xa0', 'Develop the risk culture of the business as well as undertaking business growth strategies.']
Raw Details:
Job Description

We are currently recruiting for a Risk Analytics to join the Credit Risk team. Reporting to the Head of Risk Analytics, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the organization's risk models. 

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain all regulatory requirements, comprising of risk modeling, stress testing, MIS & Intelligence and scorecard developments. 
  • Oversee various risk analytics functions and be responsible for formulating and assessing credit policies, risk acceptance criteria, risk appetite, risk-based pricing and other risk models.
  • Provide comprehensive credit analysis and presentations to provide insight of all current and future consumer finance portfolios. 
  • Develop the risk culture of the business as well as undertaking business growth strategies.

Requirements:

  • A Business Administration, Risk Management or Statistics degree
  • A minimum of 2 years’ experience in Risk Modeling, Risk Analytics and Credit/Risk Management within a Retail or Commercial financial institution; 
  • Experience in using analytics tools.
  • Having SAS knowledge and a FRM qualification will also be extremely beneficial. 
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills

Title: Data Engineer - Brands (Nextbase)
Responsibilities: ['Helping to craft and implement the data pipelines and infrastructure at Hyphen Group', 'Applying sound data engineering principles and innovative data science to improve the financial lives of our customers', 'Supporting a data-driven culture by building democratic, self-service data management and analysis tools with data privacy and governance as primary design goals', 'Engaging with data stakeholders (including application engineers, management teams, business analysts and data scientists) as a subject matter expert on data engineering practices and the application of data science to complex business problems']
Requirements: ['Helping to craft and implement the data pipelines and infrastructure at Hyphen Group', 'Applying sound data engineering principles and innovative data science to improve the financial lives of our customers', 'Supporting a data-driven culture by building democratic, self-service data management and analysis tools with data privacy and governance as primary design goals', 'Engaging with data stakeholders (including application engineers, management teams, business analysts and data scientists) as a subject matter expert on data engineering practices and the application of data science to complex business problems']
Raw Details:
THE ROLE

In an exciting, international and fast-paced work environment, you will be given challenging and diverse opportunities every day. You will collaborate with the team on building a new, high-caliber development team responsible for all core technology build-out (all stack tiers) for the Hyphen Group platforms to be deployed in markets across Asia.

YOUR TASK

  • Helping to craft and implement the data pipelines and infrastructure at Hyphen Group
  • Applying sound data engineering principles and innovative data science to improve the financial lives of our customers
  • Supporting a data-driven culture by building democratic, self-service data management and analysis tools with data privacy and governance as primary design goals
  • Engaging with data stakeholders (including application engineers, management teams, business analysts and data scientists) as a subject matter expert on data engineering practices and the application of data science to complex business problems

SKILLS & REQUIREMENTS

  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.
  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
  • 5+ years professional experience developing high-quality code in one or more SQL and Python
  • 5+ years professional experience with data-wrangling and visualization with relational and non-relational databases
  • Professional experience designing and implementing critical path data pipelines and scalable data lake architectures, ideally within a cloud platform
  • Professional experience working across the data engineering and data science technology landscape such as Metabase, Kafka, Pandas, Spark, Jupyter, Snowflake, Kubeflowand data visualization using Notebooks
  • Experience with the implementation and deployment of machine learning in the areas of customer lifetime value, marketing personalization and product recommendation
  • Experience deploying predictive modeling and statistical analysis techniques to build end-to-end production-ready solutions with associated monitoring, quality control and metadata capture
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Requirements: ['Business Analyst (SingSaver)Hyphen GroupSingapore, SingaporeSGD 3,000 – 4,000 17 Sep 2021', 'Business AnalystsZENIKA PTE LTDSingapore, SingaporeSGD 6,000 – 9,000 29 Sep 2021', 'Reporting & Performance Analytic SpecialistHalodoc IDJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 7,000,000 – 12,000,000 13 Sep 2021', 'Data EngineerGramedia e-PerpustJakarta, Indonesia 22 Oct 2021', 'Risk AnalyticsKoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 8,000,000 – 12,000,000 21 Sep 2021']
Skills Required: ['Data Warehouse', 'Data Science', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Visualization', 'Cross-Functional Team Leadership']
Raw Details:
As the Head of Data in Sinbad, you will lead a passionate data team comprised of Data Engineers, BI Analysts, and Data Scientists. You will have the opportunity to explore large scale of data from multiple sources and use advanced data science techniques to tackle a wide range of challenging business problems. In addition, you will have the chance to play around with the latest tech stacks used in modern tech companies. This position will report directly to the Chief Operation Officer.

Job descriptions:

- Build and develop a data team consisting of data engineers, business intelligence analysts, and data scientists.

- Manage individual performance and guide personal development in 1-on-1 meetings.

- Oversee the day-to-day operational works of the data team. This includes prioritization, workload management, and project management.

- Be the main point of contact with the senior management and C-Level to align data team initiatives with the strategic company objectives.

- Build and communicate policies to maintain the quality of data deliverables and to keep an optimal workflow of the team.

- Coordinate with data engineers to design a scalable data infrastructure to process high volumes of raw data into actionable business insights.

- Maintain high-quality standards of data analysis reports to support critical business decisions.

- Manage data quality and data definitions to guarantee trustworthy data reports for business stakeholders.

- Explore and assess new data science tools to continuously improve the existing data workflow.

- Be always on the lookout for new opportunities to leverage data to deliver business impacts.


Requirements:

- Bachelor degree in quantitative or scientific disciplines, Advanced degree is preferred.

- Min 5 years experience working in analytical or data science fields.

- Min 3 years experience as a lead/manager.

- Excellent communication skills with the ability to convey complex concepts to non-technical persons.

- Exceptional problem-solving skills, capable of clarifying ambiguous business problems and coming up with effective strategies to break them down and address them.

- Strong leadership, willing to work in a collaborative environment while supporting and empowering the team member.

- Having a growth mindset with strong willpower to overcome any challenges.

- Strong understanding of the best practice to build a robust and effective end-to-end data science pipeline.

- Experience in managing medium to large-scale projects with multiple stakeholders.

- Previous experience working in e-commerce/B2B industries is a plus.

- Knowledge in project management frameworks such as Scrum or Kanban is a plus.

Raw Details:
Business Analysts conduct market analyses, analysing both product lines and the overall profitability of the business. In addition, they develop and monitor data quality metrics and ensure business data and reporting needs are met. Strong technology, analytical and communication skills are must-have traits. To succeed in this role you should have a natural analytical way of thinking and be able to explain difficult concepts to non-technical users.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with Data Engineering and Data Analyst  to implement and/or supervise data ingestions from various sources.

  • An ability to initiate and build relationships with people in an open, friendly, and accepting manner

  • Comfort with adapting and adjusting to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity, and rapid change

  • Experience in Google Tag Manager and/or Google Analytics.
  • Experience in data-related features in the Google Cloud Platform ecosystem (e.g. Data Catalog, Data Studio, Google Cloud Storage, BigQuery etc).
  • Domain experience in real estate, e-commerce, advertising or marketing.

Skill in other Cloud Services is a big plus \xa0', 'Understand how to analyze & utilize data in order to provide value/insights for company decision making \xa0', 'Experienced in performing data modeling and data quality check \xa0', 'Strong project management and organizational skills. \xa0', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. \xa0', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. \xa0', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, (eg: Postgres, mongodb and redis, etc). \xa0\xa0', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Elasticsearch \xa0', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python or nodejs']

Raw Details:
The Candidate: Data Engineer

  • Working experience of at least 2 years with exposure to Big Data, Real-time data pipelines, ETL processes and suppoing tools/framework such as Airflow, spark etc
  • Excellent skills in writing efficient querying language especially SQL
  • Experience building and optimizing 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and data sets.  
  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.  
  • Experienced in Cloud Service environment, especially AWS + Redshift + Glue. Skill in other Cloud Services is a big plus  
  • Understand how to analyze & utilize data in order to provide value/insights for company decision making  
  • Experienced in performing data modeling and data quality check  
  • Strong project management and organizational skills.  
  • Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.  
  • Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.  
  • Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, (eg: Postgres, mongodb and redis, etc).   
  • Experience with stream-processing systems: Elasticsearch  
  • Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python or nodejs


What we offer:

  • A high degree of autonomy and freedom of creativity in a welcoming environment
  • Sabbatical program of 15 days blocked leave every 3 years of your tenure with us to recharge as we know that working long term in a company might be taxing.
  • We aim to create an entrepreneur out of our team, where we are committed to supporting learning and development aspirations within and outside of our organization
  • A unique environment of a mission-driven digital company present since 2012, start-up mindset always - yet a bit wiser


Our Values:

  • Think and Act Like an Owner
  • Deliver Beyond Expectation
  • Be Helpful
  • Embrace and Drive Change
  • Pursue Learning and Growth
  • Be Open, Honest and Constructive

If you are up for the challenge, we hope you will join the team and take part in our journey to be the Most Impactful CRP in the region.

To find out more about us, please explore our website and app

Title: Data Engineer
Responsibilities: ['Create, maintain and improve optimal data pipeline architecture', 'Create Data Ingestion\xa0', 'Create Data ETL/ELT', 'Compiling large and complex datasets to fulfill business requirements', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and GCP ‘big data’ technologies.', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable business insights.', 'Work with stakeholders including the Senior Management, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs', 'Re-design existing and new data model at data warehouse']
Requirements: ['Bachelor or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Computer Science)', 'Minimum 2 to 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.', 'Experience in building and optimizing ‘Big Data’ data pipelines, architectures and datasets (including Batch and Streaming pipeline)', 'Experience with big data tools: Spark, Kafka, Beam, Flink, Storm, etc.', 'Experience with relational SQL or NoSQL databases.', 'Experience with cloud services such as GCP or AWS with Linux environment and storage architecture.', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Flink, Spark-Streaming, Storm Bolt, etc.', 'Experience with multiple programming languages (preferably at least one of Python, Go, Java)', 'Experience with Airflow or Apache Nifi is a plus.', 'Having knowledge about Data warehouse concepts (at least one of Kimball, Inmon, or Data Vault) is a plus.', 'Willingness to learn new languages and technologies.', 'Experience using versioning such as Gitlab or Github.', 'Have knowledge about CI/CD is a plus']
Raw Details:
We are looking for a Sr.Data Engineer to join our growing team of analytics experts. The Data Engineer will support our software engineer, database architects, data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects. 

They must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems, and products.

Responsibilities:

  • Create, maintain and improve optimal data pipeline architecture
  • Create Data Ingestion 
  • Create Data ETL/ELT
  • Compiling large and complex datasets to fulfill business requirements
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc
  • Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and GCP ‘big data’ technologies.
  • Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable business insights.
  • Work with stakeholders including the Senior Management, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs
  • Re-design existing and new data model at data warehouse

Requirements:

  • Bachelor or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Computer Science)
  • Minimum 2 to 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Experience in building and optimizing ‘Big Data’ data pipelines, architectures and datasets (including Batch and Streaming pipeline)
  • Experience with big data tools: Spark, Kafka, Beam, Flink, Storm, etc.
  • Experience with relational SQL or NoSQL databases.
  • Experience with cloud services such as GCP or AWS with Linux environment and storage architecture.
  • Experience with stream-processing systems: Flink, Spark-Streaming, Storm Bolt, etc.
  • Experience with multiple programming languages (preferably at least one of Python, Go, Java)
  • Experience with Airflow or Apache Nifi is a plus.
  • Having knowledge about Data warehouse concepts (at least one of Kimball, Inmon, or Data Vault) is a plus.
  • Willingness to learn new languages and technologies.
  • Experience using versioning such as Gitlab or Github.
  • Have knowledge about CI/CD is a plus

If you think the above sounds fascinating, don't hesitate to apply and send us your latest CV. Our team will get back to you at soonest. Thank you!

Title: Product Manager
Responsibilities: ['Ensure the product roadmap is strategically prioritized and aligned with the company vision.', 'Accommodate the discussion with the business ops internal stakeholders.', 'Align the needs and the requirements by the industry’s best practices.', 'Scope and prioritize activities based on business operations optimization impact.', 'Define and document clear and comprehensive user stories, feature(functional process) specifications, success metrics, and acceptance criteria.', 'Groom and prioritize product backlog with the engineering team.', 'Track and monitor customer usage using analytical tools to develop insights for continuous product improvement.', 'Act as a product evangelist to build product awareness and understanding for all stakeholders.']
Requirements: ['Ensure the product roadmap is strategically prioritized and aligned with the company vision.', 'Accommodate the discussion with the business ops internal stakeholders.', 'Align the needs and the requirements by the industry’s best practices.', 'Scope and prioritize activities based on business operations optimization impact.', 'Define and document clear and comprehensive user stories, feature(functional process) specifications, success metrics, and acceptance criteria.', 'Groom and prioritize product backlog with the engineering team.', 'Track and monitor customer usage using analytical tools to develop insights for continuous product improvement.', 'Act as a product evangelist to build product awareness and understanding for all stakeholders.']
Skills Required: ['Product Management', 'Product Research', 'Product Strategy', 'Data Analysis', 'Supply Chain Management']
Raw Details:
Company Overview

Style Theory is a Fashion-Technology company that is redefining Fashion Consumption. We believe that there is an inefficiency in the way we consume fashion today and are on a mission to provide a smarter solution. 

We are currently Southeast Asia's largest and fastest-growing Circular Fashion startup. Our core product is Fashion Rental Subscription using a “Netflix-for-Fashion” model, the first and only of its kind in the region. Today, we are focused on building more products to improve Fashion Consumption and driving these solutions across the region. 

Job Summary

We are looking for a skilled Product Manager to work and grow our products and elevate the customer experience and customer happiness. You should be comfortable in a hands-on, collaborative and flexible environment, with the ability to manage multiple product initiatives. You will work closely with the Head of Product, Engineering team, Business teams, CS, Design, and the rest of the product team to execute high-quality delivery, iterations, and long-term metric achievement. 

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Ensure the product roadmap is strategically prioritized and aligned with the company vision.
  • Accommodate the discussion with the business ops internal stakeholders.
  • Align the needs and the requirements by the industry’s best practices.
  • Scope and prioritize activities based on business operations optimization impact.
  • Define and document clear and comprehensive user stories, feature(functional process) specifications, success metrics, and acceptance criteria.
  • Groom and prioritize product backlog with the engineering team.
  • Track and monitor customer usage using analytical tools to develop insights for continuous product improvement.
  • Act as a product evangelist to build product awareness and understanding for all stakeholders.

Qualifications and Skills

  • 3+ years of experience working as a Product Manager or related position
  • Bachelor's degree in Business, System Information, Computer Science, or related field and equivalent practical experience is required. An advanced degree in a business or management field is a big plus.
  • Awesome communicator (in English too). Able to explain technical or difficult concepts easily and rally cross-functional teams to solve problems that bring high impact.
  • Experience in building, monitoring, and optimizing supply chain systems is a huge plus.
  • Customer-centric; Always be the voice and advocate of the customers.
  • Creative problem solver
  • Data-driven; You can look at data visualization and are able to see and articulate what's going on and the story behind the numbers.
  • Able to think big (strategically) and execute small (tactically and detailed) - sometimes at the same time :)
  • Fast and constant learner
  • Independent worker; can deliver high-quality work with minimal supervision.

Title: Product Researcher
Responsibilities: ['Inventory Control ExecutiveChilibeliBandung, Java, IndonesiaIDR 4,000,000 – 6,000,000 2d ago', 'Account Executive MarketplacePT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk.Jakarta, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 6,250,000 27 Oct 2021', 'Local HeroesArunaJakarta, Indonesia 23 Sep 2021', 'Research InternWarung Pintar GroupJakarta, Indonesia 24 Sep 2021', 'Warehouse SupervisorHappyFreshJakarta, Indonesia 3 Nov 2021']
Requirements: ['Inventory Control ExecutiveChilibeliBandung, Java, IndonesiaIDR 4,000,000 – 6,000,000 2d ago', 'Account Executive MarketplacePT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk.Jakarta, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 6,250,000 27 Oct 2021', 'Local HeroesArunaJakarta, Indonesia 23 Sep 2021', 'Research InternWarung Pintar GroupJakarta, Indonesia 24 Sep 2021', 'Warehouse SupervisorHappyFreshJakarta, Indonesia 3 Nov 2021']
Raw Details:
About Kargo Product Team

Kargo Product Team consists of Product Management and Product Design functions. Our main job is to build products and services to achieve Kargo’s mission, and deliver best-in-class experience for our users: shippers (small businesses, enterprise businesses, freight forwarders), transporters (truck owner operators & their drivers) and internal team (our operations, customer success, finance, and sales team).

We operate a combination of human-centered design & design thinking approach in building solutions for our customers, and promote co-creation alongside our engineers and business team. We work in a dedicated team model where each squad has a designated mission and specific outcomes to achieve (we use OKR throughout the organization). Each Product Manager and Product Designer are ideally assigned with a few Product Engineers and QA Engineers to work together.

About The Role

You’ll partner with Product Design, Product Management, Operations, and Engineering to discover insights about our users, and to communicate opportunities across the company. You’ll think big about new areas to delve into, validate ideas before they're built, and evaluate products once they're delivered.

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with Product Designers and Product Managers to design, prioritise, plan, and facilitate product discovery throughout the entire product cycle
  • Gather and prioritise key questions, assumptions, and hypotheses from stakeholders
  • Gather data using a variety of qualitative and quantitative research methods to understand the (latent) needs of our users as well as gain insights of the user behavior and the context
  • Synthesise findings and represent the voice of our users to stakeholders to enable product concepts creation process that answer the user needs as well as drive product and business objectives.
  • Maintain and organise a repository of detailed research documentation
  • Be an evangelist for user-centered, evidence-based approach to product development throughout the company
  • Get involved in the team’s effort in empowering the team and continuously improve other more junior researcher’s growth through coaching, conducting review / critique sessions. You will promote learning culture, raise the bar and be part of the success.
  • Work with the Deputy Head - Product Design and the rest of the team to scale design process and practices that enable the team build something that people need and want

Basic Qualifications

  • 4+ years of working experience in product or UX research-related field
  • Strong capabilities in qualitative and quantitative research methods throughout the product cycle
  • Strong critical thinking and storytelling skills
  • Portfolio that showcases ability in analysis and synthesis of information and communicating it as actionable insights, with some level of understanding of the human-centered design methodology and information architecture in digital products interface
  • Demonstrated skills for collaborating closely with other researchers, designers, product managers and engineers
  • Fluency in English communications (both spoken and written)
  • A deep sense of accountability, adaptability, and embracing ambiguity working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
  • Ability to form consensus across a broad, fast-moving organization through excellent communication and interpersonal skills (including: presentation, constructive feedback, managing expectations, negotiation, and resolve conflicts)

Bonus Points

  • A degree in Psychology, Sociology, Anthropology, Design, Human Computer Interaction, or a related field
  • Experience driving and supporting rapid research in a scrappy environment
  • Experience in conducting and leading research for Logistics Solutions product and/or B2B SaaS company
  • Experience facilitating Design Sprints and workshops
  • Strong grasp of quantitative data analysis and statistics.

Raw Details:
Inspigo is looking for you to join our Product Team!  Inspigo, inspiration on the go, is an edutainment platform that serves up high quality of information and new ways of learning. Our vision is to enrich & empower people's lives by bringing them inspirational talks, useful knowledge, and entertainment - anytime anywhere. Inspigo is founded by seasoned Silicon Valley startup founders and one of Indonesia’s most creative entrepreneurs. Inspigo is looking for passionate people to join our growing team. 


Job description:

  • Work as project manager for selected taskforce projects of B2B products that require cross-functional collaboration by establishing the working framework and managing stakeholders.
  • Ensure the sustainability of the project outputs by ensuring proper change management and handover to the related business units.
  • Manage and coordinate various stakeholders across different divisions to collaborate in the project by conducting cadence meetings within the working team and regular reporting sessions with management.
  • Review issues within day-to-day operational processes and come up with actionable solutions.
  • Monitor project implementation, track sanity testing results and escalate any issue to the product team.
  • Ensure reduced manual process across all B2B products, reduced issues day to day basis, and seamless new product deployment.
  • Collect feedback from the customer service side and seek solutions from the product team.

Requirements:

  • Min. Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering/Management.
  • 0-1 year of working experience. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
  • Able to communicate effectively and maintain good relationships with stakeholders.
  • Strong analytical thinking skills to deeply understand the end-to-end processes and conduct impactful analysis.
  • Data-driven mindset. Able to handle numbers, read trends, and spot data discrepancies.
  • Advanced Google Sheets/Microsoft Excel skills.
  • Familiarity with cost and benefit analysis.
  • Self-starter and passionate about learning new skills and knowledge.
  • Ability to work under tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
  • Experienced in leading or coordinating a project/taskforce.
  • High level of curiosity to explore things and proactive.

Raw Details:
The IT Business Solutions Specialist (ITBSS) is responsible for delivering business outcomes from projects. The ITBSS plans, executes, and delivers all projects on time, in budget, and within scope in accordance with business priorities. Throughout the lifecycle of each project, he/she tracks project status and manages project teams to mitigate issues and risks.

This position works in close cooperation with CoE in Czech Republic, following Global IT Business Solutions guidelines and best practices in order to deliver on our Global IT strategy ‘Plug and Play Indonesia & SEA IT Ecosystem with our Global IT Core Sales and Corporate Systems’

Key Responsabilities  

· Defines and creates project plans for project, portfolio, and product   prioritization and implementation 

· Evaluates trade-offs between project size and complexity, cost,   urgency, risk, and stakeholder value

· Partners with business sponsors to define success metrics and   criteria

· Builds, leads, and coaches multiple project teams throughout project   lifecycles

· Facilitates all operational checkpoint activities throughout the   lifecycle of projects

· Assesses and resolves all high priority project risks as they are encountered

· Ensures all projects adhere to Oriflame project methodology   compliance standards

· Continually updates relevant business stakeholder of project status

· Ensures all projects meet success parameters and ROI targets stated   in business case

· Apply data science techniques and work   closely with business stakeholders to find the answer to complex business   questions and to help them achieve company goals

Skills

· Excellent project management, organization, and team collaboration   skills

· Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Bahasa Indonesia

· Excellent facilitation, collaboration, negotiation, and presentation skills

· Ability to anticipate risks and devise solutions in the moment

· Good technical skills in Oracle or Microsoft SQL DBMS 

· Able to read and debug Programming Languages (.NET, PL-SQL preferably)

· Understanding of software development lifecycles (i.e. Agile, SCRUM,   Waterfall, Iterative)

· Good technical skills in Data Analytics, Data Mining and or Data Scientist

· Ability to deliver good Data Visualization, preferable in Power BI or other Data Visualization tool

· In depth understanding of project management concepts

Requirements: ['Ensure the daily process is done accordingly based on schedule and responsibility', "Validate Officer's Daily Checklist results accuracy", 'Validate Customer Complaints received from Customer Excellence Team', 'Conduct periodic training sessions to provide knowledge to Officers regarding Procedures and Daily Checklist', 'Conduct evaluations to determine Officers performance and areas of improvement', 'Direct troubleshoot to IT Support Team when encountering technical issues']
Skills Required: ['Data Entry', 'Analytics', 'Analytical Skills', 'Analytics & Reporting', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Management', 'Operations Management', 'Operations']
Raw Details:
# Overview

As a Team Leader, you will be working directly under Standard Assurance Lead to ensure Digital Surveillance's daily operations are done smoothly according to the schedule and responsibility.

A great understanding of Outlet's Procedures is a must, to help you validate and determine the outcome of the checklist results.

# Key Responsibilities

  • Ensure the daily process is done accordingly based on schedule and responsibility
  • Validate Officer's Daily Checklist results accuracy
  • Validate Customer Complaints received from Customer Excellence Team
  • Conduct periodic training sessions to provide knowledge to Officers regarding Procedures and Daily Checklist
  • Conduct evaluations to determine Officers performance and areas of improvement
  • Direct troubleshoot to IT Support Team when encountering technical issues

# Qualification

  • Domiciled in Yogyakarta
  • Min. Bachelor's degree
  • Min. 1+ years of proven working experience in a managing position daily operations processes (i.e. customer service, call center)
  • Min. 12+ months prior experience in the F&B industry
  • Keen, well structured, and able to work in order
  • Comfortable with working under massive pressure
  • Able to deliver clear and structured communication - in written, verbal, and visual
  • Familiar with Google Applications (e.g. Drive, Docs & Slides) and Microsoft Word 
  • Good computing skill

Title: Group Head of Administration
Responsibilities: ['Title: Group Head of Administration', 'Level: Manager Level', 'Based In: Deliveree HQ in South Jakarta', 'Responsibility: Groupwide across 4 countries']
Requirements: ['Full-time work experience of 7+ years', 'Undergraduate GPA 3.5 or higher', 'Masters degree not required', 'English skills TOEFL 550+ (other English test scores are acceptable)', 'Demonstrated people and team management skills', 'Demonstrated program and project management skills', 'Strong presentation and communication skills', 'Strong spreadsheet and analysis skills']
Skills Required: ['Presentation Skills', 'Team Management', 'People Management', 'Human Resources', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Communication Skills', 'Data Analysis', 'Program Management', 'Project Management']
Raw Details:
If you just click apply, you will not receive a response. You must follow the instructions below under 'how to apply' for our team to review and respond to your application. Complete and qualified applications receive a response within 24 hours.

SUMMARY OF OPPORTUNITY

  • Title: Group Head of Administration
  • Level: Manager Level
  • Based In: Deliveree HQ in South Jakarta
  • Responsibility: Groupwide across 4 countries

Deliveree is seeking a Head of Administration. The role is responsible for oversight of administration and human resources across our group which includes teams in Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines. While this position is based in our South Jakarta HQ, there will be regular travel of approximately 1 week every month to our other international offices (such travel is suspended during the pandemic).

Our Head of Administration will be responsible for managing our administration and human resources staff in Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines. The average team admin and HR team size per country is about 3-4 people totaling a groupwide team size of approximately 15 people. 

No prior experience in company administration or human resources is required (we will train you), however you must have very strong people management, team management, program management, and project management skills. 

If this position regional position excites you, please read our qualification requirements below and then follow the instructions carefully under HOW TO APPLY.

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Full-time work experience of 7+ years
  • Undergraduate GPA 3.5 or higher
  • Masters degree not required
  • English skills TOEFL 550+ (other English test scores are acceptable)
  • Demonstrated people and team management skills
  • Demonstrated program and project management skills
  • Strong presentation and communication skills
  • Strong spreadsheet and analysis skills

BENEFITS

  • Challenging, fulfilling career
  • Regular international travel
  • Competitive monthly salary
  • 13th month annual salary bonus
  • Annual paid leave
  • Full private healthcare coverage
  • Mobile phone allowance
  • Numerous other company perks

HOW TO APPLY

Send an email to tom@deliveree.com with the below items. If you submit all the required materials and your qualifications fit our search, you will hear back from us within 24 hours.

  1. Cover email
  2. PDF resume
  3. Completed pre-interview form
  4. University grades or transcript

Download Pre-Interview Form: https://dlvr.ee/3kpgNvw
