Title: Head of Revenue
Responsibilities: ['Own the strategy and execution for Revenue growth strategy', 'Work with key stakeholders and internal departments to define revenue streams, pricing strategy, room selling, and deadlines to ensure strategic imperatives and goals are met', 'Develop growth strategies for a long-term journey, optimize operations, and drive business results', 'Work with Marketing, Tech, and Product teams to ensure that revenue technology (internal or third-party) meets the unique needs of the business', 'Use measurement, tracking, and management platforms to produce analytical insights and manage end-to-end Revenue department’s operations', 'Provide thought leadership to help identify new opportunities and other emerging platforms', 'Partner with other Leadership Team members to ensure alignment between business goals, resourcing, and budgets', 'Engage with the Management to represent resource needs and performance for Revenue Department.']
Requirements: ['Bachelor Degree or Master Degree holder, and/or proven of a minimum of 10 years of related experiences', '10+ years Revenue, Sales, and/or Product experience on a national or regional scale', 'Experienced team leader', 'Experience with the highly quantitative and analytics-driven environment, working with complex data sets to understand performance and drive optimization strategies', 'Demonstrated track record of managing a sizeable budget, driving financial performance, and attaining measurable results through projects with clear ROI', 'Demonstrated success in driving complex projects within cross-functional teams including Marketing, Product, Brand, Sales/Revenue, CRM, and Tech', 'Demonstrated strong business judgment and decision-making skills along with a clear ability to identify, prioritize, and articulate highest impact initiatives.\xa0', 'Maturity, roll-up sleeves mindset, and people development enthusiast']
Skills Required: ['Strategic Planning', 'Sales Strategy & Management', 'Sales', 'Growth Hacking', 'Pricing Strategy', 'Google Analytics', 'Data Analysis', 'Strategic Partnerships', 'Sales & Marketing']
Raw Details:
The Revenue Department at Bobobox drives sustainable growth for the business ahead and finds any and every go-to-market opportunity that provides sustainability growth revenue for the company. The role of the Revenue team is far beyond checking the prices across several platforms (e.g OTA) but also immersing several kinds of business partnerships to support Bobobox’s customer’s overall experiences and handling every kind of comments, ideas, and complaints. 

We are looking to bring on a Head of Revenue to grow the Department’s performance in supporting business performance with Establish both short-term results and long-term strategy, including revenue forecasting and growth with generating the revenue pipeline and leads, adjusting as necessary to create sustainable growth. 

This position will report directly to the CEO of Bobobox and will be based in Bandung, Jawa Barat (HQ Office). 


Responsibilities:  

  • Own the strategy and execution for Revenue growth strategy
  • Work with key stakeholders and internal departments to define revenue streams, pricing strategy, room selling, and deadlines to ensure strategic imperatives and goals are met
  • Develop growth strategies for a long-term journey, optimize operations, and drive business results
  • Work with Marketing, Tech, and Product teams to ensure that revenue technology (internal or third-party) meets the unique needs of the business
  • Use measurement, tracking, and management platforms to produce analytical insights and manage end-to-end Revenue department’s operations
  • Provide thought leadership to help identify new opportunities and other emerging platforms
  • Partner with other Leadership Team members to ensure alignment between business goals, resourcing, and budgets
  • Engage with the Management to represent resource needs and performance for Revenue Department.


Requirements:  

  • Bachelor Degree or Master Degree holder, and/or proven of a minimum of 10 years of related experiences
  • 10+ years Revenue, Sales, and/or Product experience on a national or regional scale
  • Experienced team leader
  • Experience with the highly quantitative and analytics-driven environment, working with complex data sets to understand performance and drive optimization strategies
  • Demonstrated track record of managing a sizeable budget, driving financial performance, and attaining measurable results through projects with clear ROI
  • Demonstrated success in driving complex projects within cross-functional teams including Marketing, Product, Brand, Sales/Revenue, CRM, and Tech
  • Demonstrated strong business judgment and decision-making skills along with a clear ability to identify, prioritize, and articulate highest impact initiatives. 
  • Maturity, roll-up sleeves mindset, and people development enthusiast

Title: Product Manager
Responsibilities: ['Group Product Manager - Lending KoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 30,000,000 – 40,000,000 2 Oct 2021', 'Product SupportBobobox IndonesiaBandung, Java, Indonesia 5 Nov 2021', 'Video Editorkelas.comJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 4,500,000 – 5,000,000 30 Sep 2021', 'Sales ManagerRevoUJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 50,000,000 14 Sep 2021', 'Product Manager - Core Investment KoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 18,000,000 – 25,000,000 1 Oct 2021']
Requirements: ['Group Product Manager - Lending KoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 30,000,000 – 40,000,000 2 Oct 2021', 'Product SupportBobobox IndonesiaBandung, Java, Indonesia 5 Nov 2021', 'Video Editorkelas.comJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 4,500,000 – 5,000,000 30 Sep 2021', 'Sales ManagerRevoUJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 5,000,000 – 50,000,000 14 Sep 2021', 'Product Manager - Core Investment KoinWorksJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 18,000,000 – 25,000,000 1 Oct 2021']
Skills Required: ['Product Development', 'Product Management', 'Product Research', 'Market Research & Analysis', 'User Research', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Management', 'Databases']
Raw Details:
As Product Manager you will be responsible for owning the entire product lifecycle from strategy to evaluation. You will also work cross-functionally to complete product roadmaps. 


What you will do;

1. Lead a cross-functional team, partnering with other departments to ship high impact capabilities and product improvements driving efficiency.

2. Define, track and report on key product, business and customer metrics

3. Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows

4. Do a continuous research, both online and offline, to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions

5. Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences

6. Collaborate with internal stakeholders in support, marketing, operations, and business to develop go to market strategy, product messaging and training for a successful launch.


We're looking for someone who;

1. At least 2 years of experience working as a product manager, ideally working on consumer-facing. Additional experience as a product analyst / data scientist / software engineer / consulting is a plus.

3. Independent and curious, you set your own targets and always looking to learn something new.

4. Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project. Fluency with numbers is a must.

5. You are comfortable to give a very high view of the roadmap and also simultaneously you are comfortable with talking about the details of finer nuances in the product.

6. You are comfortable with a research job to define the problem statements and getting in the depth of problem areas.

7. You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best.

8. Ever using an agile development methodology is a plus.

Raw Details:
We are looking for an experienced Marketing Specialist to place in our Jakarta – Indonesia office.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop, implement, and track marketing programs such as social media, emails, digital campaigns, events, and partners.
  • Support the team to analyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaigns.
  • Support the team to conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new marketing opportunities.
  • Develop and create marketing materials and ensure brand guidelines are met.
  • Write, proofread, and edit creative and technical content.
  • Work with external agencies and vendors to execute marketing programs.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a marketing specialist or a similar role at least 3 years
  • Thorough understanding of marketing elements (including traditional and digital marketing such as Social media, etc.) and market research methods.
  • Must have the basic knowledge for digital marketing such as SEO, SEM, Social Media, Email Marketing, Content Marketing, etc.
  • Demonstrable experience in marketing data analytics and tools.
  • Solid computer skills, including MS Office, Google Workspace, and familiarity with marketing software is a plus.
  • Well-organized and detail-oriented
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Exceptional communication and writing skills
  • Commercial awareness partnered with a creative mind
  • BSc/BA in marketing, communications, or equivalent

We apologize in advance – we may only be able to get back to shortlisted candidates; but we really, really appreciate every application, we think that is the greatest flattery we could ask for. Thank you!

Raw Details:
About Jagofon

We are an early-stage startup (pre-Series A), and Indonesia's first marketplace specialized in second-hand smartphones. Our mission is to rebuild trust in the second-hand smartphone market, with top quality yet affordable phones. We follow a meticulous selection and testing methodology to bring our customers the very best. And by giving a second life to a device, we are helping to reduce electronic waste and protect the environment.

The profile that we are interested in will share the following values:
- Customer-obsession: You shall always start with the customers and work backward from there to deliver the highest value and level of service to them. You shall work vigorously to earn customer trust.
- Taking ownership: You shall be accountable at all times, show drive and initiative, and never say “No, that’s not my job!”


Responsibilities
- Design, develop, and manage multiple secure and reliable web applications that manage transactions
- Create, monitor, and report tests to improve user experience and conversion rate
- Maintain product compatibility across devices
- Write stable and testable code


Required Skills
- Javascript
- HTML5
- CSS3
- Laravel
- Vue.js/Nuxt.js
- Git (GitLab/GitHub)
- Data Analysis/Processing
- Attention to detail
- Good sense of UI/UX
- Fluent in English

Additional Skills
- Testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress, PHPUnit, Pest)
- Telemetry and APM (Google Analytics, Sentry)
- Docker
- Jira
- CI/CD
- UI/UX design principles
- Web performance tools
- Python
- Machine Learning

Title: Frontend Software Engineer (Vue)
Responsibilities: ['Software Engineer - BackendLoketJakarta, Indonesia 21 Sep 2021', 'Software Documentation EngineerSagara Technology GroupJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 3,000,000 – 4,500,000 14 Oct 2021', 'Front End Developer (ReactJS)AlemHealth, Ltd.Singapore, SingaporeSGD 2,000 – 5,000 18 Oct 2021', 'Software & Machine Learning EngineerForest AI Pte LtdSingapore, SingaporeIDR 13,000,000 – 50,000,000 9 Oct 2021', 'Senior Back End EngineerJULOJakarta, Indonesia 2 Nov 2021']
Requirements: ['Software Engineer - BackendLoketJakarta, Indonesia 21 Sep 2021', 'Software Documentation EngineerSagara Technology GroupJakarta, IndonesiaIDR 3,000,000 – 4,500,000 14 Oct 2021', 'Front End Developer (ReactJS)AlemHealth, Ltd.Singapore, SingaporeSGD 2,000 – 5,000 18 Oct 2021', 'Software & Machine Learning EngineerForest AI Pte LtdSingapore, SingaporeIDR 13,000,000 – 50,000,000 9 Oct 2021', 'Senior Back End EngineerJULOJakarta, Indonesia 2 Nov 2021']
Raw Details:
We are looking for an Ionic / Angular engineer who can join our App Team. You will be handling our cross-platform mobile app, from building of new features to ensuring client requirements are being fulfilled.

If you have excellent programming knowledge and a passion for developing applications or improving existing ones, we would like to meet you. As an Ionic Engineer, you’ll be responsible for developing our mobile app further. Your primary focus will be development of front-side logic with always having the user in mind. You will collaborate with Backend Engineers to integrate data and with Web Designers to improve usability. At the team, we value code which is well designed, testable, and efficient and ensure we adopt good design principles with leading software development practices.

Ultimately, you should be able to develop and maintain functional and stable app features with sleek, high performance user interfaces to meet our company’s needs.

RESPONSIBILITIES

• Design and build our event app that revolutionizes how interactions are done at events.
• Ability to work anywhere in the frontend technical stack, delivering quality code with well written unit tests.
• You will be working closely with the team to build and test new features and client requirements, and further improve the UI / UX of the app. At the same time, you will have ownership of your projects as you lead them and make design decisions in the code and infrastructure level.

REQUIREMENTS

• Be able to develop frontend hybrid mobile applications in Vue.
• Strong Computer Science background with understanding of the principles of modern software development.
• A solid foundation in Javascript, Typescript, HTML and CSS.
• You understand one-way and two-way data binding, MVC, and other UI design patterns
• Knowing the basics of how JSONs are structured, for effective communication with the backend.

NICE TO HAVE

• An understanding of the web development process from design, development, testing to deployment. Or you could learn it from us!
• Familiarity with front-end web or mobile application design is beneficial.
• Having developed UI components before using tools like SASS, Mixins, bourbon.
• Experience with browser testing and code debugging and deployment on Android and iOS platforms.
• Involvement with continuous integration tools and test automation is plus.
• Published one or more iOS / Android apps is a plus.

WHY JUBLIA

• This is going to be a learning experience like no other! Be prepared to be challenged in a fast-paced environment.
• Our global clientele will challenge your thinking about matchmaking in different geographical cultures, across more than 40 different industry sectors.
• The products you build will be used by leading B2B events with over 100,000 unique users monthly.
• We take pride in our coding and want you to do the same. Together, we are all about shipping clean and efficient code.
• We are detail-oriented, especially with solving issues. We never do shoddy patching of codes.
• We take your career growth and skills development to heart. We strive to help you lead a professional and personal life with us.

Title: Digital Surveillance Officer (Yogyakarta)

Raw Details:
# Overview

As an Officer, you will be working directly under Digital Surveillance Team Leader mainly checking on Outlet's performance via online (CCTV), producing checklist results on a daily basis.

A great understanding of Outlet's procedure is a must, this would help you get all the checklist done within the accuracy target.

# Key Responsibilities

  • Checking on Outlet's performance online on a daily basis-Exceeding the expectation on the percentage of progress work and accuracy on a daily basis at 85%

# Qualification

  • Domiciled in Yogyakarta
  • Min. Diploma
  • Min. 6+ months prior administrative experience in a nationwide company
  • Min. 12+ months prior experience in the F&B industry
  • Keen, well structured, and able to work in order
  • Comfortable with working under massive pressure
  • Able to communicate well
  • Familiar with Google Applications (e.g. Drive, Docs & Slides)
  • Good computing skill

Title: Corporate Finance Analyst
Responsibilities: ['Collect and analyze financial data (financial budgets, income statement forecasts, etc.)', 'Evaluating capital expenditures, funding sources, capital structuring, and investment decisions', 'Writes financial reports and tracks financial movements', 'Recommend actions by analyzing and interpreting data and making comparative analyses.', 'Conduct preparation and review of materials used in the financing of clients, including investment memoranda, management presentations and pitch books.']
Requirements: ['Bachelor’s Degree in Finance/Accounting/Economics (Overseas graduate is preferred)', '3+ years experience in a startup or venture capital background', 'High proficiency with SQL and financial modelling.', 'Proficiency in MS. Office, particularly with Excel.', 'Deep knowledge in corporate finance, financial planning, financial forecasting and diagnosis']
Raw Details:
Job Descriptions

  • Collect and analyze financial data (financial budgets, income statement forecasts, etc.)
  • Evaluating capital expenditures, funding sources, capital structuring, and investment decisions
  • Writes financial reports and tracks financial movements
  • Recommend actions by analyzing and interpreting data and making comparative analyses.
  • Conduct preparation and review of materials used in the financing of clients, including investment memoranda, management presentations and pitch books.


Job Requirements

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Finance/Accounting/Economics (Overseas graduate is preferred)
  • 3+ years experience in a startup or venture capital background
  • High proficiency with SQL and financial modelling.
  • Proficiency in MS. Office, particularly with Excel.
  • Deep knowledge in corporate finance, financial planning, financial forecasting and diagnosis
